life.quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them
life.author: David Hume

life.quote: The seeds of beauty are in humility
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

life.quote: You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful
life.author: Amy Bloom

life.quote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself
life.author: Coco Chanel

life.quote: You may be one person to the world but you may also be the world to one person
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it
life.author: Richard Bach

life.quote: It’s just a bad day. Not a bad life
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Whenever you are creating beauty around you, you are restoring your own soul
life.author: Alice Walker

life.quote: This is a wonderful day, I have never seen this one before
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious – the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The roots of beauty are love and kindness, the fruits are meaning and purpose
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: I don’t think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains
life.author: Anne Frank

life.quote: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads
life.author: Anatole France

life.quote: Beauty is a nectar which intoxicates the soul. T.C
life.author: Henley

life.quote: A morning-glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books
life.author: Walt Whitman

life.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: There is no perfection, only beautiful versions of brokenness. Shannon L
life.author: Alder

life.quote: Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful
life.author: Sophia Loren

life.quote: There is a road from the eye to the heart that does not go through the intellect. G.K
life.author: Chesterton

life.quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: When was the last time you just closed your eyes and just listened?
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: Whereas the beautiful is limited, the sublime is limitless, so that the mind in the presence of the sublime, attempting to imagine what it cannot, has pain in the failure but pleasure in contemplating the immensity of the attempt
life.author: Immanuel Kant

life.quote: Childhood means simplicity. Look at the world with the child’s eye – it is very beautiful
life.author: Kailash Satyarthi

life.quote: Those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Have a heart that never hardens, and a temper that never tires, and a touch that never hurts
life.author: Charles Dickens

life.quote: Beauty is strangely various. There is the beauty of light and joy and strength exulting; but there is also the beauty of shade, of sorrow and sadness, and of humility oppressed
life.author: Arnold Bennett

life.quote: I’ve never seen a smiling face that was not beautiful
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Your happy ending may not be what you expect, but that is what will make it so special
life.author: Snow White (Once Upon a Time)

life.quote: Outer beauty is a gift. Inner beauty is an accomplishment. Randi G
life.author: Fine

life.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone
life.author: Johann von Goethe

life.quote: Kindness is like snow – It beautifies everything it covers
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Nobody is superior, nobody is inferior, but nobody is equal either. People are simply unique, incomparable. You are you. I am I
life.author: Osho

life.quote: I don’t like standard beauty – there is no beauty without strangeness
life.author: Karl Lagerfeld (Chanel)

life.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don’t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness
life.author: Stendhal

life.quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical
life.author: Sophia Loren

life.quote: Wisdom is the abstract of the past, but beauty is the promise of the future
life.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

life.quote: Beauty is visible music. T.C
life.author: Henley

life.quote: Beauty is man’s voucher of immorality. T.C
life.author: Henley

life.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world
life.author: Anne Frank

life.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better
life.author: Samuel Beckett

life.quote: There is no torture that a woman would not endure to enhance her beauty
life.author: Michel de Montaigne

life.quote: There is no exquisite beauty without some strangeness in the proportion
life.author: Edgar Allan Poe

life.quote: All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren’t
life.author: Marilyn Monroe

life.quote: When you do something noble and beautiful and nobody noticed, do not be sad. For the sun every morning is a beautiful spectacle and yet most of the audience still sleeps
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: Beauty? To me it is a word without sense because I do not know where its meaning comes from nor where it leads to
life.author: Pablo Picasso

life.quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their good intellects
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The ideals which have always shone before me and filled me with joy are goodness, beauty, and truth
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Our task must be to free ourselves… by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and it’s beauty
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The most beautiful make-up of a woman is passion. But cosmetics are easier to buy
life.author: Yves Saint Laurent

life.quote: Don’t let them say you ain’t beautiful. They can all get fucked, just stay true to you
life.author: Eminem

life.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow
life.author: Helen Keller

life.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous
life.author: Coco Chanel

life.quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: How lucky am I to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard
life.author: Winnie The Pooh

life.quote: A flower blossoms for its own joy
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean
life.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

life.quote: Beauty is a delightful prejudice
life.author: Theocritus

life.quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever
life.author: John Keats

life.quote: Beautiful things don’t ask for attention
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: It’s okay not to be okay
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act
life.author: Dante Alighieri

life.quote: There is beauty in simplicity
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: The beautiful is always bizarre
life.author: Charles Baudelaire

life.quote: Look around you. Appreciate what you have. Nothing will be the same in a year
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Sometimes there is such beauty in awkwardness
life.author: Ruta Sepetys

life.quote: Madame, beauty is always queen, and the whole world her empire
life.author: Joseph II

life.quote: Beauty and folly are generally companions
life.author: Baltasar Gracián

life.quote: Beauty always promises, but never gives anything
life.author: Simone Weil

life.quote: Because you are alive, everything is possible
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: If you see something beautiful in someone, speak it
life.author: Ruthie Lindsey

life.quote: You are good enough, smart enough, beautiful enough, strong enough
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Over the centuries, people have placed a wall around mastery. They have called it genius and have thought of it as inaccessible…But that wall is imaginary. This is the real secret: the brain that we possess…was designed to lead us to mastery
life.author: Robert Greene

life.quote: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees
life.author: Rumi

life.quote: The appearance of things changes according to the emotions; and thus we see magic and beauty in them, while the magic and beauty are really in ourselves
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Small minds can’t comprehend big spirits. To be great, you have to be willing to be mocked, hated, and misunderstood
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: You are loved. You are wonderfully made. You are beautiful. You have purpose. You are a masterpiece
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious
life.author: Stephen Hawking

life.quote: Be strong, be fearless, be beautiful. And believe that anything is possible when you have the right people there to support you
life.author: Misty Copeland

life.quote: You never look at anything beautiful and holy, or think a pure and noble thought, without being ever after a larger soul
life.author: Frederick Lynch

life.quote: Someday everything will make perfect sense. So, for now, laugh at the confusion, smile through the tears, and keep reminding yourself that everything happens for a reason
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do
life.author: Oprah Winfrey

life.quote: In every man’s heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty
life.author: Christopher Morley

life.quote: This sky where we live is no place to lose your wings. So love, love, love
life.author: Hafez

life.quote: I have learned that every heart will get what is prays for most
life.author: Hafez

life.quote: It’s never too late for a new beginning in your life
life.author: Joyce Meyers

life.quote: The truth is not always beautiful, nor beautiful words the truth
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: A beautiful soul has no other merit than its own existence
life.author: Friedrich von Schiller

life.quote: Instinct is a marvelous thing. It can neither be explained nor ignored
life.author: Agatha Christie

life.quote: Man cannot do without beauty, and this is what our era pretends to want to disregard
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: What humbugs we are, who pretend to live for Beauty, and never see the Dawn!
life.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

life.quote: When you say ‘Black is beautiful’ you are saying, ‘Man you are okay as you are, begin to look upon yourself as a human being
life.author: Steven Biko

life.quote: Beauty is unbearable, drives us to despair, offering us for a minute the glimpse of an eternity that we should like to stretch out over the whole of time
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: Beauty unites all things, links together flower and star, with chains more certain than those of reason. The poet, the artist, thus finds the clue which guides them in their pilgrimage throughout the world
life.author: Henry James Slack

life.quote: Girls aren’t beautiful, they’re pretty. Beautiful is too heavy a word to assign to a girl. Women are beautiful because their faces show that they know, they have lost something and picked up something else
life.author: Henry Rollins

life.quote: Everything passes away – suffering, pain, blood, hunger, pestilence. The sword will pass away too, but the stars will remain when the shadows of our presence and our deeds have vanished from the Earth. There is no man who does not know that
life.author: Why, then, will we not turn our eyes toward the stars? Why? Mikhail Bulgakov

life.quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears
life.author: Edgar Allan Poe

life.quote: How terrible this darkness was, how bewildering, and yet mysteriously beautiful!
life.author: Stefan Zweig

life.quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: If a man cannot understand the beauty of life, it is probably because life never understood the beauty in him
life.author: Criss Jami

life.quote: You’re like a gray sky. You’re beautiful, even though you don’t want to be
life.author: Jasmine Warga

life.quote: We need beauty because it makes us ache to be worthy of it
life.author: Mary Oliver

life.quote: A woman who cannot be ugly is not beautiful
life.author: Karl Kraus

life.quote: Beauty deprived of its proper foils and adjuncts ceases to be enjoyed as beauty, just as light deprived of all shadows ceases to be enjoyed as light
life.author: John Ruskin

life.quote: Tell them dear, that if eyes were made for seeing, then beauty is its own excuse for being
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: Our hearts are drunk with a beauty our eyes could never see. George W
life.author: Russell

life.quote: Plainness has its peculiar temptations quite as much as beauty
life.author: George Eliot

life.quote: What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible
life.author: Marie Dubsky

life.quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful
life.author: Sigmund Freud

life.quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express
life.author: Francis Bacon

life.quote: All the diversity, all the charm, and all the beauty of life are made up of light and shade
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: Do not beautify your appearance, but be beautiful in your way of life
life.author: Thales of Miletus

life.quote: The world is a depressing place if you look for depressing shit. The world is a beautiful place if you look for beautiful stuff
life.author: Ed Latimore

life.quote: Pure design appeals to the eye just as absolute music appeals to the ear
life.author: Denman Waldo Ross

life.quote: The criterion of true beauty is that it increases on examination; of false, that it lessens
life.author: Fulke Greville

life.quote: When I am working on a problem I never think about beauty. I only think about how to solve the problem. But when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong
life.author: Buckminster Fuller

life.quote: Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are
life.author: Markus Zusak

life.quote: When people see some things as beautiful, other things become ugly. When people see some things as good, other things become bad

life.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: Beauty is no quality in things themselves: It exists merely in the mind which contemplates them; and each mind perceives a different beauty
life.author: David Hume

life.quote: I would define, in brief, the poetry of words as the rhythmical creation of beauty
life.author: Edgar Allan Poe

life.quote: Don’t cry over the past, it’s gone. Don’t stress about the future, it hasn’t arrived. Live in the present and make it beautiful
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Why do we close our eyes when we pray, cry, kiss or dream? Because the most beautiful things in life are not seen but felt by the heart
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Faith makes all things possible. Hope makes all things work. Love makes all things beautiful. May you have all three
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: If you foolishly ignore beauty, then you will soon find yourself without it
life.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

life.quote: Beauty intoxicates the eyes, as wine does the body; both are morally fatal if indulged
life.author: John Godfrey Saxe

life.quote: That which is striking and beautiful is not always good, but that which is good is always beautiful
life.author: Ninon de L’Enclos

life.quote: Beauty without grace is a hook without a bait
life.author: Ninon de l’Enclos

life.quote: But he who dares not grasp the thorn. Should never crave the rose
life.author: Anne Brontë

life.quote: An individual human existence should be like a river: small at first, narrowly contained within its banks, and rushing passionately past rocks and over waterfalls. Gradually, the river grows wider, the banks recede, the waters flow more quietly, and in the end, without any visible break, they become merged in the sea, and painlessly lose their individual being
life.author: Bertrand Russell

life.quote: You are more powerful than you know; you are beautiful just as you are
life.author: Melissa Etheridge

life.quote: Isn’t it nice to think that tomorrow is a new day with no mistakes in it yet?
life.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

life.quote: You have a treasure within you that is infinitely greater than anything the world can offer
life.author: Eckhart Tolle

life.quote: You must find the place inside yourself where nothing is impossible
life.author: Deepak Chopra

life.quote: A good half of the art of living is resilience
life.author: Alain de Botton

life.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to cheer somebody else up
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Change. It has the power to uplift, to heal, to stimulate, surprise, open new doors, bring fresh experience and create excitement in life. Certainly it is worth the risk
life.author: Leo Buscaglia

life.quote: Make a conscious effort to surround yourself with positive, nourishing, and uplifting people – people who believe in you, encourage you to go after your dreams, and applaud your victories
life.author: Jack Canfield

life.quote: You are that vast thing that you see far, far off with great telescopes
life.author: Alan Watts

life.quote: You are the sky. Everything else – it’s just the weather
life.author: Pema Chödrön

life.quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours
life.author: Orison Swett Marden

life.quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think and twice as beautiful as you’ve ever imagined. Dr
life.author: Seuss

life.quote: Prepare your mind to receive the best that life has to offer
life.author: Ernest Holmes

life.quote: To learn, make mistakes. To grow, keep going. To fly, take the risk
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: Have the best day you can, today. Win the moment in front of you now. Win the day
life.author: James Clear

life.quote: All greatness comes from suffering
life.author: Naval Ravikant

life.quote: A man is great not because he hasn’t failed; a man is great because failure hasn’t stopped him
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Fight for your dreams, even if that means fighting alone
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: You choose the future with your actions each day
life.author: James Clear

life.quote: Get better daily. Don’t try to get it all done in a day
life.author: Shane Parrish=

life.quote: As you become more and more positive and more and more joyful, by your powerful example you uplift all of those around you
life.author: Rhonda Byrne

life.quote: Accept right now that you are magnificent. Being your real, true, authentic self is what’s most awesome about you
life.author: Gabby Bernstein

life.quote: The uplift of a fearless heart will help us over barriers
life.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

life.quote: Do you know that you’re strong on the inside, too?
life.author: Fred Rogers

life.quote: I do not allow others to influence my thinking unless it is positive or uplifting
life.author: Louise Hay

life.quote: Thoughts of lack manifest as limitation. Thoughts of abundance manifest as success and happiness. Failure and success are but two ends of the same stick
life.author: Ernest Holmes

life.quote: If I could give you one thought, it would be to lift someone up. Lift a stranger up – lift her up. I would ask you, mother and father, brother and sister, lovers, mother and daughter, father and son, lift someone. The very idea of lifting someone up will lift you, as well
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: Just as one candle lights another and can light thousands of other candles, so one heart illuminates another heart and can illuminate thousands of other hearts
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work. Booker T
life.author: Washington

life.quote: You are a very special person. There is only one like you in the whole world. There’s never been anyone exactly like you before, and there will never be again. Only you. And people can like you exactly as you are
life.author: Fred Rogers

life.quote: One of the most astonishing human traits: our ability to keeping getting up, lugging ourselves around and doing our stuff day after day
life.author: Alain de Botton

life.quote: You become successful when you’re humble; your only concerns are learning and growing. You don’t care what they think
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: True enthusiasm is a fine feeling whose flash I admire wherever I see it
life.author: Charlotte Brontë

life.quote: How beautiful the world was when one looked at it without searching, just looked, simply and innocently
life.author: Hermann Hesse

life.quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try
life.author: Alexander the Great

life.quote: Talented people almost always know full well the excellence that is in them
life.author: Charlotte Brontë

life.quote: There is nothing in the world so irresistibly contagious as laughter and good humor
life.author: Charles Dickens

life.quote: Sacrifice that causes pain is no sacrifice at all. True sacrifice is joy-giving and uplifting
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: The future is in your hearts and in your hands. God is entrusting to you the task, at once difficult and uplifting, of working with Him in the building of the civilization of love
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: All the goodness and the heroisms will rise up again, then be cut down again and rise up
life.author: John Steinbeck

life.quote: Precious jewel, you glow, you shine, reflecting all the good things in the world. Just look at yourself
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: Our fate lives within us; you only have to be brave enough to see it
life.author: Merida (Brave, Disney)

life.quote: No man is defeated without until he has first been defeated within
life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

life.quote: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world
life.author: Bill Wilson

life.quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose. Lyndon B
life.author: Johnson

life.quote: There is an eloquence in true enthusiasm
life.author: Edgar Allan Poe

life.quote: When something bad happens you have three choices. You can either let it define you, let it destroy you, or you can let it strengthen you. Dr
life.author: Seuss

life.quote: Sometimes we feel we can’t do much by ourselves, but humanity is made up of individuals; we can make a difference. As individuals we can influence our own families. Our families can shape our communities and our communities form our nations. Together we can make a better world
life.author: 14th Dalai Lama

life.quote: Time is always moving on; nothing can stop it. We can’t change the past, but we can learn from it to shape the future. Let’s work together to create a happier future
life.author: 14th Dalai Lama

life.quote: We should be excited about the future and striving to go beyond the horizon
life.author: Elon Musk (Tesla)

life.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek
life.author: Barack Obama

life.quote: I want you to know that you deserve the best. You’re beautiful
life.author: Lil Wayne

life.quote: Look at the stars, look how they shine for you
life.author: Chris Martin (Coldplay, Yellow)

life.quote: Where there’s life there’s hope, and need of vittles. J.R.R
life.author: Tolkien (The Lord of the Rings)

life.quote: If you’re making mistakes it means you’re out there doing something
life.author: Neil Gaiman

life.quote: You can outwork anybody
life.author: David Goggins

life.quote: Optimists swim upstream
life.author: Jack Butcher

life.quote: Think higher, feel deeper
life.author: Elie Wiesel

life.quote: Today is a good day to try
life.author: Quasimodo (Disney)

life.quote: What if I could defy the odds?
life.author: David Goggins

life.quote: Even miracles take a little time
life.author: Fairy Godmother (Cinderella Disney)

life.quote: Change is never easy, but also possible
life.author: Barack Obama

life.quote: Every day is an opportunity for a new life
life.author: Rhonda Byrne

life.quote: You are guided. You are protected. You are loved
life.author: Iyanla Vanzant

life.quote: Focus on the smallest thing you can do right now
life.author: Ryan Holiday

life.quote: Have confidence in your ability to make the best of anything
life.author: Ryan Holiday

life.quote: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind. C.S
life.author: Lewis

life.quote: What if I just keep going? What if it works? What if I get lucky?
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: Be thankful for your failures. They reveal the winning strategies
life.author: James Clear

life.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. C.S
life.author: Lewis

life.quote: The moment you accept what troubles you’ve been given, the door will open
life.author: Rumi

life.quote: You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think
life.author: Winnie the Pooh

life.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds
life.author: Francis Bacon

life.quote: We have more possibilities available in each moment than we realize
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: No one ever overcomes difficulties by going at them in a hesitant, doubtful way
life.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

life.quote: Having doubts is fine, giving up is not. Having big dreams is good, having discipline is greater
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: Be who you said you’d become
life.author: Joel Leon

life.quote: Stop deluding yourself that you’re not ready or that you need something before you start. You have everything you need: a brain, a desire, and a lack of shame. Go get it
life.author: Mark Manson

life.quote: You may fill your heads with knowledge or skillfully train your hands, but unless it is based upon high, upright character, upon a true heart, it will amount to nothing. You will be no better than the most ignorant. Booker T
life.author: Washington

life.quote: The more you choose to do things that uplift yourself and others the more your spirit can shine, can heal you, can lead your life
life.author: What can you do today to uplift yourself? To uplift others? Sonia Choquette

life.quote: Every day we are engaged in a miracle which we don’t even recognize: a blue sky, white clouds, green leaves, the black, curious eyes of a child — our own two eyes. All is a miracle
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: Your life is in your hands. Every single circumstance in your life can change
life.author: Rhonda Byrne

life.quote: Realize that true happiness lies within you. Waste no time and effort searching for peace and contentment and joy in the world outside. Remember that there is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving. Reach out. Share. Smile. Hug. Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself
life.author: Og Mandino

life.quote: Just for today, be a little child. Know the world is safe. Know that you are loved
life.author: Iyanla Vanzant

life.quote: Confident people fail all the time. You just need to have the confidence to keep trying
life.author: Mel Robbins

life.quote: The "secret" to "luck" is sheer persistence. Don’t make it harder than that
life.author: Preethi Kasireddy

life.quote: Bad news? Keep building. Good news? Keep building. No news? Keep building
life.author: Jack Butcher

life.quote: But I’m English. We don’t do uplifting
life.author: Tony Judt

life.quote: Do not worry about your difficulties in mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Begin – to begin is half the work, let half still remain; again begin this, and thou wilt have finished
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Gratitude is the wine for the soul. Go on. Get drunk
life.author: Rumi

life.quote: Change your perspective. Things may happen for you, not to you
life.author: Maxime Lagacé

life.quote: Life always waits for some crisis to occur before revealing itself at its most brilliant
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Nothing is sadder than laughter; nothing more beautiful, more magnificent, more uplifting and enriching than the terror of deep despair
life.author: Federico Fellini

life.quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself

life.quote: Nothing is impossible when you put your mind, heart, soul and sweat into it

life.quote: Do you know how much I adore you?

life.quote: You’re are wonderful. Remember that

life.quote: Good morning perfectly perfect you

life.quote: Something wonderful is going to happen to an extraordinary person like you

life.quote: You’re beautiful! Good morning!

life.quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight

life.quote: You are breathtaking

life.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done

life.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life

life.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying

life.quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened

life.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all
life.author: Helen Keller

life.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you’ve imagined

life.quote: Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all. St

life.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become

life.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step

life.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living

life.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma, which is living with the results of other people’s thinking. Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition
life.author: Steve Jobs

life.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Our life is frittered away by detail. Simplify, simplify
life.author: Henry David Thoreau

life.quote: The best way out is always through
life.author: Robert Frost

life.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom. George S
life.author: Patton

life.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself

life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated

life.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game

life.quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams

life.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things

life.quote: Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better

life.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet

life.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me

life.quote: I’m always doing things I can’t do. That’s how I get to do them

life.quote: The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has been before

life.quote: To do the useful thing, to say the courageous thing, to contemplate the beautiful thing: that is enough for one man’s life. T.S
life.author: Eliot

life.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples

life.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin

life.quote: Your best life will not be found in comfort. It will be found in fighting for what you believe in

life.quote: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can

life.quote: Doing is a quantum leap from imagining

life.quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you

life.quote: If you say you can or you can’t you are right either way

life.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier

life.quote: I am thankful to all who said no to me. It is because of them that I’m doing it myself

life.quote: Life is so short. I would rather sing one song than interpret the thousand

life.quote: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together

life.quote: The flavor of life is on the edge

life.quote: We are evolved to search for meaning but ultimately life has none

life.quote: This is your life and it’s ending one minute at a time

life.quote: The more unintelligent a man is, the less mysterious existence seems to him

life.quote: The shortness of life, so often lamented, may be the best thing about it

life.quote: Nobody can predict the future; the idea is to have a firm grasp of the present. Peter F

life.quote: We no longer live life. We consume it

life.quote: As Nietzsche put it, if you have a WHY to live, you can bear almost any "HOW". A meaningful life can be extremely satisfying even in the midst of hardship whereas a meaningless life is a terrible ordeal no matter how comfortable it is

life.quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.

life.quote: Life is pain. Anyone who says otherwise is selling something

life.quote: If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long

life.quote: The planet is fine. The people are fucked

life.quote: Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead

life.quote: If my life is going to mean anything, I have to live it myself
life.author: Rick Riordan

life.quote: Life’s too mysterious to take too serious

life.quote: Nothing you do is going to matter that much in the long run. Don’t take yourself so seriously

life.quote: The only beautiful path is the one you create

life.quote: In every success story, you will find someone who has made a courageous decision. Peter F

life.quote: Life is to enjoyed, not endured.

life.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular. Roy T

life.quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you don’t stop and look around once in a while you could miss it

life.quote: If we admit that human life can be ruled by reason, then all possibility of life is destroyed

life.quote: When you want something in life, you just gotta reach out and grab it
life.author: Christopher McCandless (Into The Wild movie)

life.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create. Roy T
life.author: Bennett

life.quote: Blessed is he who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed

life.quote: People tend to complicate their own lives, as if living weren’t already complicated enough

life.quote: Good judgment comes from experience, and experience comes from bad judgment

life.quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it’s a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope. Which is what I do, and that enables you to laugh at life’s realities. Dr

life.quote: The best answer to anger is silence

life.quote: To live a good life: We have the potential for it. If we can learn to be indifferent to what makes no difference

life.quote: To love only what happens, what was destined. No greater harmony

life.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the color of its thoughts

life.quote: Receive without conceit, release without struggle

life.quote: Life is short. That’s all there is to say. Get what you can from the present – thoughtfully, justly

life.quote: Be content to seem what you really are

life.quote: How soon will time cover all things, and how many it has covered already

life.quote: Nothing natural is evil

Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: If someone responds to insult like a rock, what has the abuser gained with his invective? Marcus Aurelius

life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Be tolerant with others and strict with yourself
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The first step: Don’t be anxious. Nature controls it all
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The second step: Concentrate on what you have to do. Fix your eyes on it. Remind yourself that your task is to be a good human being; remind yourself what nature demands of people. Then do it, without hesitation, and speak the truth as you see it. But with kindness. With humility. Without hypocrisy

Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: Is any man afraid of change? What can take place without change? What then is more pleasing or more suitable to the universal nature? life.quote: Confine yourself to the present

life.quote: Whatever happens to you has been waiting to happen since the beginning of time

life.quote: That which is not good for the bee-hive cannot be good for the bees

life.quote: To live happily is an inward power of the soul

life.quote: You can commit injustice by doing nothing

life.quote: Someone despises me. That’s their problem

life.quote: Character and self-control.

life.quote: Integrity and manliness
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from his father)

life.quote: To accept without arrogance, to let it go with indifference

life.quote: Each day provides its own gifts

life.quote: Anger cannot be dishonest
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Nothing should be done without a purpose

life.quote: Even the smallest thing should be done with reference to an end
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What is your art? To be good
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Give yourself a gift: the present moment
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: What illusion about myself do I entertain?

life.quote: Glory’s an empty, changeable thing, as fickle as the weather
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Poverty is the mother of crime
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A man should be upright, not be kept upright
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Nothing happens to anyone that he can’t endure
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Keep at it… As a blazing fire takes whatever you throw on it, and makes it light and flame

life.quote: So you were born to feel "nice"? Instead of doing things and experiencing them? And you’re not willing to do your job as a human being? Why aren’t you running to do what your nature demands?
If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment

life.quote: Take the shortest route, the one that nature planned – to speak and act in the healthiest way. Do that, and be free of pain and stress, free of all calculation and pretention

life.quote: As if you had died and your life had extended only to this present moment, use the surplus that is left to you to live from this time onward according to nature
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: There were two vices much blacker and more serious than the rest: lack of persistence and lack of self-control… persist and resist

life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Look within. Within is the foundation of good, and it will ever bubble up, if you will ever dig
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The only wealth which you will keep forever is the wealth you have given away

life.quote: Nothing has such power to broaden the mind as the ability to investigate systematically and truly all that comes under thy observation in life
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Forward, as occasion offers. Never look round to see whether any shall note it… Be satisfied with success in even the smallest matter, and think that even such a result is no trifle
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible for anyone to accomplish
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: It is in your power to live here. But if men do not permit you, then get away out of life, as if you were suffering no harm. The house is smoky, and I quit it. But so long as nothing of the kind drives me out, I remain, am free, and no man shall hinder me from doing what I choose; and I choose to do what is according to the nature of the rational and social animal
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: If you didn’t learn these things in order to demonstrate them in practice, what did you learn them for?
People with a strong physical constitution can tolerate extremes of hot and cold; people of strong mental health can handle anger, grief, joy and the other emotions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: How long will you wait before you demand the best of yourself, and trust reason to determine what is best?
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: ‘I will throw you into prison.’ Correction – it is my body you will throw there
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: In the morning, when you rise unwillingly, let this thought be present: I am rising to the work of a human being

life.quote: No man can escape his destiny, the next inquiry being how he may best live the time that he has to live
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: Have I been made for this, to lie under the blankets and keep myself warm?
Do you have reason? I have. Why then do you not use it?

life.quote: ‘But I get to wear a crown of gold.’ If you have your heart set on wearing crowns, why not make one out of roses – you will look even more elegant in that
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: Who exactly are these people that you want to be admired by? Aren’t they the same people you are in the habit of calling crazy? And is this your life ambition, then – to win the approval of lunatics?

Consider what men are when they are eating, sleeping, coupling, evacuating, and so forth. Then what kind of men they are when they are imperious and arrogant, or angry and scolding from their elevated place
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: For all their compliments do verses pay? They mayn’t, yet these same poems make me gay
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Conceal a flaw, and the world will imagine the worst
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If you learn that someone is speaking ill of you, don’t try to defend yourself against the rumours; respond instead with, ‘Yes, and he doesn’t know the half of it, because he could have said more’
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Let us overlook many things in those who are like antagonists in the gymnasium. For it is in our power, as I said, to get out of the way and to have no suspicion or hatred
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: It is just charming how people boast about qualities beyond their control. For instance, ‘I am better than you because I have many estates, while you are practically starving’; or, ‘I’m a consul,’ ‘I’m a governor,’ or ‘I have fine curly hair’

life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: "A cucumber is bitter." Throw it away. "There are briars in the road." Turn aside from them. This is enough. Do not add, "And why were such things made in the world?"
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Always observe how ephemeral and worthless human things are, and what was yesterday a speck of semen tomorrow will be a mummy or ashes
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Under no circumstances ever say ‘I have lost something,’ only ‘I returned it’
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To do harm is to do yourself harm. To do an injustice is to do yourself an injustice
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Tomorrow is nothing, today is too late; the good lived yesterday
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Do little, if you want contentment of mind.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Misfortune nobly born is good fortune
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If something does not make a person worse in himself, neither does it make his life worse, nor does it harm him without or within
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Death and life, success and failure, pain and pleasure, wealth and poverty, all these happen to good and bad alike, and they are neither noble nor shameful – and hence neither good nor bad
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The present is the only thing of which a man can be deprived, if it is true that this is the only thing which he has, and that a man cannot lose something he does not already possess
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You must become an old man in good time if you wish to be an old man long
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Don’t believe your situation is genuinely bad – no one can make you do that. Is there smoke in the house? If it’s not suffocating, I will stay indoors; if it proves too much, I’ll leave. Always remember – the door is open
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What springs from earth dissolves to earth again, and heaven-born things fly to their native seat
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Someone bathes in haste; don’t say he bathes badly, but in haste. Someone drinks a lot of wine; don’t say he drinks badly, but a lot. Until you know their reasons, how do you know that their actions are vicious
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Consider that everything is opinion, and opinion is in your power. Take away then, when you choose, your opinion, and like a mariner who has rounded the headland, you will find calm, everything stable, and a waveless bay
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The sexual embrace can only be compared with music and with prayer
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The flaw which is hidden is deemed greater than it is
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Glory paid to our ashes comes too late
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The universe is transformation: life is opinion
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A vine cannot behave olively, nor an olive tree vinely – it is impossible, inconceivable. No more can a human being wholly efface his native disposition
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Since the greatest part of what we say and do is unnecessary, dispensing with such activities affords a man more leisure and less uneasiness
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To have contemplated human life for forty years is the same as to have contemplated it for ten thousand years. For what more will you see?
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Passions stem from frustrated desire
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Everything that happens happens as it should, and if you observe carefully, you will find this to be so
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Each thing is of like form from everlasting and comes round again in its cycle
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: Whatever man you meet with, immediately say to yourself: "What opinions has this man about good and bad?"
To the rational animal the same act is at once according to nature and according to reason
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Poverty’s no evil to anyone unless he kicks against it
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A thing is neither better nor worse for having been praised
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Take care that you don’t treat inhumanity as it treats human beings
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A person’s worth is measured by the worth of what he values
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: An ignorant person is inclined to blame others for his own misfortune. To blame oneself is proof of progress. But the wise man never has to blame another or himself
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The mind in itself has no needs, except for those it creates itself. Is undisturbed, except for its own disturbances. Knows no obstructions, except those from within
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Whatever anyone does or says, I must be good, just as if the gold, or the emerald, or the purple were always saying this, whatever anyone does or says, I must be emerald and keep my color
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Your three components: body, breath, mind. Two are yours in trust; to the third alone you have clear title
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: No one objects to what is useful to him. To be of use to others is natural. Then don’t object to what is useful to you – being of use
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: When I see that one thing [virtue] is supreme and most important, I cannot say that something else is, just to make you happy
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A boxer derives the greatest advantage from his sparring partner – and my accuser is my sparring partner. He trains me in patience, civility and even temper
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Either you’re going to be depressed when your wish is not realized or foolishly pleased with yourself if it is, overjoyed for the wrong reasons
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: I say that virtue is more valuable than wealth to the same degree that eyes are more valuable than fingernails
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Most of us dread the deadening of the body and will do anything to avoid it. About the deadening of the soul, however, we don’t care one iota
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Don’t let outward appearances mislead you into thinking that someone with more prestige, power or some other distinction must on that account be happy
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: As you are careful when you walk not to step on a nail or turn your ankle, so you should take care not to do any injury to your character at the same time
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If you lost the capacity to read, or play music, you would think it was a disaster, but you think nothing of losing the capacity to be honest, decent and civilized
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Things do not touch the soul, for they are external and remain immovable; so our perturbations come only from our inner opinions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: We are too much accustomed to attribute to a single cause that which is the product of several, and the majority of our controversies come from that
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Pleasures, when they go beyond a certain limit, are but punishments
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: As it is with a play, so it is with life – what matters is not how long the acting lasts, but how good it is. It is not important at what point you stop. Stop wherever you will – only make sure that you round it off with a good ending
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: He often acts unjustly who does not do a certain thing; not only he who does a certain thing
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If someone is incapable of distinguishing good things from bad and neutral things from either – well, how could such a person be capable of love? The power to love, then, belongs only to the wise man
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Often injustice lies in what you aren’t doing, not only in what you are doing
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Stop wishing for something else to happen, for a different fate. That is to live a false life
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Enough of this miserable, whining life. Stop monkeying around! Why are you troubled? What’s new here? What’s so confounding? The one responsible? Take a good look. Or just the matter itself? Then look at that. There’s nothing else to look at. And as far as the gods go, by now you could try being more straightforward and kind. It’s the same, whether you’ve examined these things for a hundred years, or only three
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Mastery of reading and writing requires a master. Still, more so life
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Consider that as the heaps of sand piled on one another hide the former sands, so in life the events that go before are soon covered by those that come after
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If, at some point in your life, you should come across anything better than justice, honesty, self-control, courage – than a mind satisfied that is has succeeded in enabling you to act rationally, and satisfied to accept what’s beyond its control – if you find anything better than that, embrace it without reservations – it must be an extraordinary thing indeed – and enjoy it to the full
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Where a man can live, he can also live well
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Treat what you don’t have as nonexistent. Look at what you have, the things you value most, and think of how much you’d crave them if you didn’t have them. But be careful. Don’t feel such satisfaction that you start to overvalue them – that it would upset you to lose them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Just ask whether they put their self-interest in externals or in moral choice. If it’s in externals, you cannot call them friends, any more than you can call them trustworthy, consistent, courageous or free
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: While you live, while it is in your power, be good
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: What is the goal of virtue, after all, except a life that flows smoothly?

life.author: Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: For where else is friendship found if not with fairness, reliability and respect for virtue only?
You will give yourself relief, if you do every act of your life as if it were the last
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Do not act as if you were going to live ten thousand years. Death hangs over you. While you live, while it is in your power, be good
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Be cheerful also, and do not seek external help or the tranquillity that others give. A man then must stand erect, not be kept erect by others
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The art of life is more like the wrestler’s art than the dancer’s, in respect of this, that it should stand ready and firm to meet onsets that are sudden and unexpected
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The object in life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The history of your life is now complete and your service is ended: and how many beautiful things you have seen; and how many pleasures and pains you have despised; and how many things called honorable you have spurned; and to how many ill-minded folks you have shown a kind disposition
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Anything in any way beautiful derives its beauty from itself and asks nothing beyond itself. Praise is no part of it, for nothing is made worse or better by praise
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Every day as it comes should be welcomed and reduced forthwith into our own possession as if it were the finest day imaginable. What flies past has to be seized at
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Don’t hope that events will turn out the way you want, welcome events in whichever way they happen: this is the path to peace.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Nothing is as encouraging as when virtues are visibly embodied in the people around us, when we’re practically showered with them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The tranquillity that comes when you stop caring what they say. Or think, or do. Only what you do
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Do not indulge in dreams of having what you have not, but reckon up the chief of the blessings you do possess, and then thankfully remember how you would crave for them if they were not yours
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: When they’re really possessed by what they do, they’d rather stop eating and sleeping than give up practicing their arts
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: People look for retreats for themselves, in the country, by the coast, or in the hills… There is nowhere that a person can find a more peaceful and trouble-free retreat than in his own mind… So constantly give yourself this retreat, and renew yourself
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The things that are essential are acquired with little bother; it is the luxuries that call for toil and effort
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: When you wish to delight yourself, think of the virtues of those who live with you; for instance, the activity of one, the modesty of another, the liberality of a third, and some other good quality of a fourth
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To the gods I am indebted for having good grandfathers, good parents, a good sister, good teachers, good associates, good kinsmen and friends, nearly everything good. For all these [blessings in my life] require the help of the gods and fortune
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: All you need are these: certainty of judgment in the present moment; action for the common good in the present moment; and an attitude of gratitude in the present moment for anything that comes your way
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Nothing is burdensome if taken lightly, and how nothing need arouse one’s irritation so long as one doesn’t make it bigger than it is by getting irritated
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You can discard most of the junk that clutters your mind – things that exist only there – and clear out space for yourself: by comprehending the scale of the world, by contemplating infinite time, by thinking of the speed with which things change – each part of every thing; the narrow space between our birth and death; the infinite time before; the equality unbounded time that follows
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Her reverence for the divine, her generosity, her inability not only to do wrong but even to conceive of doing it. And the simple way she lived – not in the least like the rich
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from his mother)

life.quote: If you seek tranquility, do less. Or do what’s essential – what the logos of a social being requires, and in the requisite way. Which brings a double satisfaction: to do less, better. Because most of what we say and do is not essential. If you can eliminate it, you’ll have more time, and more tranquility. Ask yourself at every moment, ‘Is this necessary?’
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Think not so much of what you lack as of what you have: but of the things that you have, select the best, and then reflect how eagerly you would have sought them if you did not have them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Remind yourself that it is not the future or what has passed that afflicts you, but always the present
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Today I have got out of all trouble, or rather I have cast out all trouble, for it was not outside, but within and in my opinions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Don’t waste the rest of your time here worrying about other people – unless it affects the common good. It will keep you from doing anything useful. You’ll be too preoccupied with what so-and-so is doing, and why, and what the’re saying, and what they’re thinking, and what they’re up to, and all the other things that throw you off and keep you from focusing on your own mind
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You can pass your life in an equable flow of happiness if you can follow the right way and think and act in the right way
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Failure to observe what is in the mind of another has seldom made a man unhappy; but those who do not observe the movements of their own minds must of necessity be unhappy
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Set yourself in motion, if it is in your power, and do not look about you to see if anyone will observe it; nor yet expect Plato’s Republic: but be content if the smallest thing goes on well, and consider such an event to be no small matter
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Here is a rule to remember in future, when anything tempts you to feel bitter: not "This is misfortune," but "To bear this worthily is good fortune"
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You must turn to profit the present by the aid of reason and justice
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A key point to bear in mind: The value of attentiveness varies in proportion to its object. You’re better off not giving the small things more time than they deserve
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Forget everything else. Keep hold of this alone and remember it: Each of us lives only now, this brief instant. The rest has been lived already, or is impossible to see
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Brief is man’s life and small the nook of the earth where he lives; brief, too, is the longest posthumous fame, buoyed only by a succession of poor human beings who will very soon die and who know little of themselves, much less of someone who died long ago
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: How much time he saves who does not look to see what his neighbor says or does or thinks
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Altogether the interval is small between birth and death; and consider with how much trouble, and in company with what sort of people and in what a feeble body, this interval is laboriously passed
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Keep in mind how fast things pass by and are gone – those that are now and those to come. Existence flows past us like a river: the ‘what’ is in constant flux, the ‘why’ has a thousand variations. Nothing is stable, not even what’s right here. The infinity of past and future gapes before us – a chasm whose depths we cannot see
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: How short is the time from birth to dissolution, and the illimitable time before birth as well as the equally boundless time after dissolution
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The perfection of moral character consists in this, in passing every day as if it were the last, and in being neither violently excited nor torpid nor playing the hypocrite
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Think of all the years passed by in which you said to yourself "I’ll do it tomorrow," and how the gods have again and again granted you periods of grace of which you have not availed yourself. It is time to realize that you are a member of the Universe, that you are born of Nature itself, and to know that a limit has been set to your time. Use every moment wisely, to perceive your inner refulgence, or ’twill be gone and nevermore within your reach
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Not to waste time on nonsense
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from Diognetus)

life.quote: Life is warfare… Then what can guide us? Only philosophy
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: No role is so well suited to philosophy as the one you happen to be in right now
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The first thing a pretender to philosophy must do is get rid of their presuppositions; a person is not going to undertake to learn anything that they think they already know
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: "It’s unfortunate that this has happened". No. It’s fortunate that this has happened and I’ve remained unharmed by it — not shattered by the present or frightened of the future. It could have happened to anyone. But not everyone could have remained unharmed by it
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Take a good hard look at people’s ruling principle, especially of the wise, what they run away from and what they seek out
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: People who are physically ill are unhappy with a doctor who doesn’t give them advice, because they think he has given up on them. Shouldn’t we feel the same towards a philosopher – and assume that he has given up hope of our ever becoming rational – if he will no longer tell us what we need (but may not like) to hear?
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Your mind will take the shape of what you frequently hold in thought, for the human spirit is colored by such impressions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: My advice is really this: what we hear the philosophers saying and what we find in their writings should be applied in our pursuit of the happy life. We should hunt out the helpful pieces of teaching, and the spirited and noble-minded sayings which are capable of immediate practical application – not far-fetched or archaic expressions or extravagant metaphors and figures of speech – and learn them so well that words become works
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: The work of philosophy is simple and modest. Do not draw me aside into pomposity
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: It stares you in the face. No role is so well suited to philosophy as the one you happen to be in right now
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: This, then, is the beginning of philosophy – an awareness of one’s own mental fitness
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: This presumption that you possess knowledge of any use has to be dropped before you approach philosophy – just as if we were enrolling in a school of music or mathematics
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Reflect on the other social roles you play. If you are a council member, consider what a council member should do. If you are young, what does being young mean, if you are old, what does age imply, if you are a father, what does fatherhood entail? Each of our titles, when reflected upon, suggests the acts appropriate to it
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What then can guide a man? One thing and only one, philosophy. But this consists in keeping the daimon within a man free from violence and unharmed, superior to pains and pleasures, doing nothing without a purpose, nor yet falsely and with hypocrisy
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If you commit to philosophy, be prepared at once to be laughed at and made the butt of many snide remarks
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: My city and country, so far as I am Antoninus, is Rome; but so far as I am a man, it is the world
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Do you want to know if you are educated? Show us your values, philosopher
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You don’t love yourself enough. Or you’d love your nature too, and what it demands of you
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Consider if you have behaved to all in such a way that this way be said of you: Never has he wronged a man in deed or word
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What is divine deserves our affection because it is good; what is human deserves our affection because it is like us
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: People who love what they do wear themselves down doing it, they even forget to wash or eat
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The spiritual meaning of love is measured by what it can do. Love is meant to heal. Love is meant to renew. Love is meant to bring us closer to God
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: [Treat] unenlightened souls with sympathy and indulgence, remembering that they are ignorant or mistaken about what’s most important. Never be harsh, remember Plato’s dictum: ‘Every soul is deprived of the truth against its will’
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Shall any man hate me? That will be his affair. But I will be mild and benevolent toward every man, and ready to show even him his mistake, not reproachfully, nor yet as making a display of my endurance, but nobly and honestly
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Accustom yourself to attend carefully to what is said by another, and as much as it is possible, try to inhabit the speaker’s mind
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: In your conversation, don’t dwell at excessive length on your own deeds or adventures. Just because you enjoy recounting your exploits doesn’t mean that others derive the same pleasure from hearing about them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: One thing here is worth a great deal: to pass your life in truth and justice, with a benevolent disposition even to liars and unjust men
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Refer your action to no other end than the common good
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Do not be whirled about, but in every movement have respect to justice, and on the occasion of every impression maintain the faculty of comprehension or understanding
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If a man is mistaken, instruct him kindly and show him his error. But if you are not able, blame yourself, or not even yourself
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: When you have trouble getting out of bed in the morning, remember that your defining characteristic – what defines a human being — is to work with others. Even animals know how to sleep. And it’s the characteristic activity that’s the more natural one – more innate and more satisfying
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: Is helping others less valuable to you? Not worth your effort?
From my brother Severus to love my kin, and to love truth, and to love justice
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from Severus)

life.quote: To show intuitive sympathy for friends, tolerance to amateurs and sloppy thinkers
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from Sextus)

life.quote: From Sextus to tolerate ignorant persons, and those who form opinions without consideration
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from Sextus)

life.quote: To have learned how to accept favors from friends without losing your self-respect or appearing ungrateful
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from Apollonius)

life.quote: His respect for people who practiced philosophy – at least, those who were sincere about it. But without denigrating the others – or listening to them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from his adopted father)

life.quote: Never value anything as profitable that compels you to break your promise, to lose your self-respect, to hate any man, to suspect, to curse, to act the hypocrite, to desire anything that needs walls and curtains
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Only attend to yourself, and resolve to be a good man in every act that you do
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Adapt yourself to the things among which your lot has been cast and love sincerely the fellow creatures with whom destiny has ordained that you shall live
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What is your art? To be good. And how is this accomplished well except by general principles, some about the nature of the universe, and others about the proper constitution of man?
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: People exist for one another. You can instruct or endure them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: As an antidote to battle unkindness we were given kindness
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What is your vocation? To be a good person.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Whatever any one does or says, I must be good, just as if the emerald (or the gold or the purple) were always saying "Whatever any one does or says, I must be emerald and keep my color"
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: First, do nothing inconsiderately or without a purpose. Second, make your acts refer to nothing else but a social end
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: When a guide meets up with someone who is lost, ordinarily his reaction is to direct him on the right path, not mock or malign him, then turn on his heel and walk away. As for you, lead someone to the truth and you will find that he can follow. But as long as you don’t point it out to him, don’t make fun of him; be aware of what you need to work on instead
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: That no one could ever have felt patronized by him – or in a position to patronize him. A sense of humour
life.author: Marcus Aurelius (What Marcus learned from Maximus)

life.quote: No matter what anyone says or does, my task is to be good
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If you have been placed in a position above others, are you automatically going to behave like a despot? Remember who you are and whom you govern – that they are kinsmen, brothers by nature, fellow descendants of Zeus
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: ‘Well, what will my profession in the community be?’ Whatever position you are equipped to fill, so long as you preserve the man of trust and integrity
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Perhaps there are none more lazy, or more truly ignorant, than your everlasting readers
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To be feared is to fear: no one has been able to strike terror into others and at the same time enjoy peace of mind himself
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Have I done something for the common good? Then I share in the benefits. To stay centered on that. Not to give up
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The secret of all victory lies in the organization of the non-obvious
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: A man’s worth is no greater than his ambitions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Another person will not hurt you without your cooperation; you are hurt the moment you believe yourself to be
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Ambition means tying your well-being to what other people say or do. Self-indulgence means tying it to the things that happen to you. Sanity means tying it to your own actions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To understand the true quality of people, you must look into their minds, and examine their pursuits and aversions
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
Marcus Aurelius
life.quote: When you’ve done well and another has benefited by it, why like a fool do you look for a third thing on top— credit for the good deed or a favor in return?

A noble man compares and estimates himself by an idea which is higher than himself; and a mean man, by one lower than himself. The one produces aspiration; the other ambition, which is the way in which a vulgar man aspires
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The following are non-sequiturs: ‘I am richer, therefore superior to you’; or ‘I am a better speaker, therefore a better person, than you’
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Something good should be a source of pride, correct? ‘Yes.’ And can one really take pride in a momentary pleasure? Please don’t say yes
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: All our efforts must be directed towards an end, or we will act in vain. If it is not the right end, we will fail utterly
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: So when you hear that even life and the like are indifferent, don’t become apathetic; and by the same token, when you’re advised to care about them, don’t become superficial and conceive a passion for externals
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Whenever externals are more important to you than your own integrity, then be prepared to serve them the remainder of your life
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Being attached to many things, we are weighed down and dragged along with them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Nothing important comes into being overnight; even grapes or figs need time to ripen. If you say that you want a fig now, I will tell you to be patient. First, you must allow the tree to flower, then put forth fruit; then you have to wait until the fruit is ripe. So if the fruit of a fig tree is not brought to maturity instantly or in an hour, how do you expect the human mind to come to fruition, so quickly and easily?
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Never get into family fights over material things; give them up willingly, and your moral standing will increase in proportion
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If you are pained by external things, it is not they that disturb you, but your own judgement of them. And it is in your power to wipe out that judgement now
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To be sure, external things of whatever kind require skill in their use, but we must not grow attached to them; whatever they are, they should only serve for us to show how skilled we are in our handling of them
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Do as Socrates did, never replying to the question of where he was from with, ‘I am Athenian,’ or ‘I am from Corinth,’ but always, ‘I am a citizen of the world’
life.author: Marcus Aurelius
