What is there to know?I hear my being dance from ear to ear.I wake to sleep, and take my waking slow.Of those so close beside me, which are you?God bless the Ground! I shall walk softly there,And learn by going where I have to go.Light takes the Tree; but who can tell us how?The lowly worm climbs up a winding stair;I wake to sleep, and take my waking slow.Great Nature has another thing to doTo you and me, so take the lively air,And, lovely, learn by going where to go.This shaking keeps me steady. I should know.What falls away is always. And is near.I wake to sleep, and take my waking slow.I learn by going where I have to go.
life.author: Theodore Roethke

life.quote: A heart has problems which mind cannot understand.
life.author: Santosh Kalwar

life.quote: But fate, as Merlin always taught us, is inexorable. Life is a jest of the Gods, Merlin liked to claim, and there is no justice. You must learn to laugh, he once told me, or else you'll just weep yourself to death.
life.author: Bernard Cornwell

life.quote: You can never know about about your own destiny: are the people you meet there to play a part on your oun destiny, or do you exist just to play a role in theirs?
life.author: Libba Bray

life.quote: Even as your body betrays you, your mind denies it.
life.author: Sara Gruen

life.quote: Dedicate yourself to what gives your life true meaning and purpose; make a positive difference in someone's life.
life.author: Roy T. Bennett

life.quote: Non-judgment quiets the internal dialogue, and this opens once again the doorway to creativity.
life.author: Deepak Chopra

life.quote: Learning the truth has become my life's love.
life.author: Dan Brown

life.quote: Imagine no limitations; decide what's right and desirable before you decide what's possible.
life.author: Brian Tracy

life.quote: I suppose [my life] has most resembled a blue chip stock: fairly stable, more ups than downs, and gradually trending upward over time. A good buy, a lucky buy, and I've learned that not everyone can say that about his life.
life.author: Nicholas Sparks

life.quote: Nalaman kong habang lumalaki ka, maraming beses kang madadapa. Bumangon ka man ulit o hindi, magpapatuloy ang buhay, iikot ang mundo, at mauubos ang oras.
life.author: Bob Ong

life.quote: if i'm going to fuck up my life, does it really matter which way i do it?.
life.author: Jodi Picoult

life.quote: I must talk, and you must listen, for we are engaged here in the most important pursuit in history: the search for meaning. What is the nature of being a person? What is the best way to go about being a person? How did we come to be, and what will become of us when we are no longer? In short: What are the rules of this game, and how might we best play it?
life.author: John Green

life.quote: Life can take so many twists and turns. You can’t ever count yourself out. Even if you’re really afraid at some point, you can’t think that there’s no room for you to grow and do something good with your life.
life.author: Portia de Rossi

life.quote: CIRCLES OF LIFEEverythingTurns,Rotates,Spins,Circles,Loops,Pulsates,Resonates,AndRepeats.CirclesOf life,Born fromPulsesOf light,VibrateToBreathe,WhileSpiralingOutwardsForInfinityThroughThe lensOf time,And intoA seaOf starsAndLucidDreams.Poetry by Suzy Kassem
life.author: Suzy Kassem

life.quote: You better start swimming, or you'll sink like a stone. Because the Time's they are a-changing.
life.author: Bob Dylan

life.quote: Hidup hanya ada erti pada yang bahagia.
life.author: Hlovate

life.quote: Waking At NightThe blue river is grey at morningand evening. There is twilightat dawn and dusk. I lie in the darkwondering if this quiet in me nowis a beginning or an end.
life.author: Jack Gilbert

life.quote: When you live for many hundreds of years, you know that every opportunity will come again.
life.author: Philip Pullman

life.quote: It would be perfect if everyone who makes love, is in love, but this is simply an unrealistic expectation. I'd say 75 percent of the population of people who make love, are not in love, this is simply the reality of the human race, and to be idealistic about this is to wait for the stars to aline and Jupiter to change color; for the Heavens to etch your names together in the sky before you make love to someone. But idealism is immaturity, and as a matter of fact, the stars may never aline, Jupiter may never change color, and the Heavens may never ever etch your names together in the sky for you to have the never-ending permission to make endless love to one another. And so the bottom line is, there really is no difference between doing something today, and doing something tomorrow, because today is what you have, and tomorrow may not turn out the way you expect it to. At the end of the day, sex is an animalistic, humanistic, passionate desire.
life.author: C. JoyBell C.

life.quote: So, preferring death to capture, I accomplished the most astonishing deeds, and which, more then once, showed me that the too great care we take of our bodies is the only obstacle to the sucess of those projects which require rapid decision, and vigorous and determined execution. In reality, when you have once devoted your life to your enterprises, you are no longer the equal of other men, or, rather, other men are no longer your equals, and whosoever has taken this resolution, feels his strength and resources doubled.
life.author: Alexandre Dumas

life.quote: No lake so still but it has its wave.No circle so perfect but that it has its blur.I would change things for you if I could; As I can't you must take them as they are.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: In the end,The treasure of life is missed by those who hold on and gained by those who let go.
life.author: Laotzu

life.quote: You can’t control what others think. The only thing you can control is yourself. Some people will look down on you for your choices in life, no matter what they are. You can’t do anything about that. The only thing you can do is decide how to live your own life. And to hell with everybody else
life.author: Marie Sexton

life.quote: Yet if I was asked to do this again - in fact, if I was ever asked to repeat any of my experiences - I'd have to say, fuck it, bring them on. I've no regrets.This is what it means to be alive.
life.author: John Barrowman

life.quote: Never show anger at slight,Tell nothing.Earn Respect from everyone by deeds,not Words.Respect the members of your Blood Family.Gambling was Recreation,Not a way to earn a Living.Love your Father,your Mother,your Sister but beware of Loving any other Woman than your Wife.And a Wife was a woman who bore your Children.And once that happened to You,your Life was Forfeit to give them their daily bread
life.author: Mario Puzo

life.quote: One who has loved truly, can never lose entirely. Love is whimsical and temperamental. Its nature is ephemeral, and transitory. It comes when it pleases,and goes away without warning. Accept and enjoy it while it remains, but spend no time worrying about its departure. Worry will never bring it back.
life.author: Napoleon Hill

life.quote: You get what you give. What you put into things is what you get out of them.
life.author: Jennifer Lopez

life.quote: Doubt is a question mark; faith is an exclamation point. The most compelling, believable, realistic stories have included them both.
life.author: Criss Jami

life.quote: I didn’t know. I feel sometimes like…there are all these rules. Just to be a person. You know? You’re supposed to carry a shoulder bag, not a backpack. You’re supposed to wear headbands, or you’re not supposed to wear headbands. It’s okay to describe yourself as likeable, but it’s not okay to describe yourself as eloquent. You can sit in the front of the school bus, but you can’t sit in the middle. You’re not supposed to be with a boy, even when he wants you to. I didn’t know that. There are so many rules, and they don’t make any sense, and I just can’t learn them all
life.author: Leila Sales

life.quote: I welcome questions. I hate assumptions.
life.author: Red Haircrow

life.quote: The thing about being catapulted into a whole new life--or at least, shoved up so hard against someone else's life that you might as well have your face pressed against their window--is that it forces you to rethink your idea of who you are. Or how you might seem to other people.
life.author: Jojo Moyes

life.quote: when we were kidslaying around the lawnon ourbellies we often talkedabouthowwe'd like todie andwe allagreed on thesamething; we'd alllike to diefucking (althoughnone of ushaddone anyfucking) and nowthatwe are hardlykidsany longer we think moreabouthownot todie andalthoughwe'reready most ofuswouldprefer todo italone under thesheets nowthat most ofus have fuckedour livesaway.
life.author: Charles Bukowski

life.quote: You never really know what's coming. A small wave, or maybe a big one. All you can really do is hope that when it comes, you can surf over it, instead of drown in its monstrosity.
life.author: Alysha Speer

life.quote: Life itself is the proper binge.
life.author: Julia Child

life.quote: Stop giving your life away to other people.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: The soul is like an uninhabited worldthat comes to life only whenGod lays His headagainst us.
life.author: St. Thomas Aquinas

life.quote: This is not the end, this is not even the beginning of the end, this is just perhaps the end of the beginning.
life.author: Winston S. Churchill

life.quote: Everything that had happened was shockingly beautiful, enough to make you crazy.
life.author: Banana Yoshimoto

life.quote: Be happy -- if you're not even happy, what's so good about surviving?
life.author: Tom Stoppard

life.quote: I thought about the days i had handed over to a bottle..the nights i can't remember..the mornings i slept thru..all the time spent running from myself.
life.author: Mitch Albom

life.quote: My name is Jimmy,but my friends just call methe hideous penguin boy.
life.author: Tim Burton

life.quote: If you were all alone in the universe with no one to talk to, no one with which to share the beauty of the stars, to laugh with, to touch, what would be your purpose in life? It is other life; it is love, which gives your life meaning. This is harmony. We must discover the joy of each other, the joy of challenge, the joy of growth.
life.author: Mitsugi Saotome

life.quote: If you say that you never lie in life,you honestly insult my intelligence.
life.author: Toba Beta

life.quote: Let us work without reasoning,' said Martin; 'it is the only way to make life endurable.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Most of us won't see one another after graduation, and even if we do it will be different. We'll be different. We'll be adults--cured, tagged and labeled and paired and identified and placed neatly on our life path, perfectly round marbles set to roll down even, well-defined slopes.
life.author: Lauren Oliver

life.quote: I could just remember how my father used to say that the reason for living was to get ready to stay dead a long time.
life.author: William Faulkner

life.quote: You must purge yourself before finding faults in others.When you see a mistake in somebody else, try to find if you are making the same mistake.This is the way to take judgment and to turn it into improvement.Do not look at others' bodies with envy or with superiority.All people are born with different constitutions.Never compare with others.Each one's capacities are a function of his or her internal strength.Know your capacities and continually improve upon them.
life.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

life.quote: I think there is a song out there to describe just about any situation.
life.author: Criss Jami

life.quote: There are two kinds of secrets. The ones we keep from others and the ones we keep from ourselves.
life.author: Frank Warren

life.quote: But then, life is a constant withering of possibilities. Some are stolen with the lives of people you love. Others are let go, with regret and reluctance and deep, deep sorrow. But there is compensation for lives unlived in the intoxicating joy of knowing that the life you have - right here, right now - if the one you have chosen. There is power in that, and hope.
life.author: Emily Maguire

life.quote: The world is a prison in which solitary confinement is preferable.
life.author: Karl Kraus

life.quote: Sometimes I think there are only two instructions we need to follow to develop and deepen our spiritual life: slow down and let go.
life.author: Oriah Mountain Dreamer

life.quote: Regular maps have few surprises: their contour lines reveal where the Andes are, and are reasonably clear. More precious, though, are the unpublished maps we make ourselves, of our city, our place, our daily world, our life; those maps of our private world we use every day; here I was happy, in that place I left my coat behind after a party, that is where I met my love; I cried there once, I was heartsore; but felt better round the corner once I saw the hills of Fife across the Forth, things of that sort, our personal memories, that make the private tapestry of our lives.
life.author: Alexander McCall Smith

life.quote: We define our identity always in dialogue with, sometimes in struggle against, the things our significant others want to see in us. Even after we outgrow some of these others—our parents, for instance—and they disappear from our lives, the conversation with them continues within us as long as we live.
life.author: Charles Taylor

life.quote: So the hours are pretty good then?' he resumed.The Vogon stared down at him as sluggish thoughts moiled around in the murky depths.Yeah,' he said, 'but now you come to mention it, most of the actual minutes are pretty lousy.
life.author: Douglas Adams

life.quote: Dustfinger inspected his reddened fingers and felt the taut skin. ‘He might tell me how my story ends,’ he murmured.Meggie looked at him in astonishment. ‘You mean you don’t know?’Dustfinger smiled. Meggie still didn’t particularly like his smile. It seemed to appear only to hide something else. ‘What’s so unusual about that, princess?’ he asked quietly. ‘Do you know how your story ends?’Meggie had no answer for that.
life.author: Cornelia Funke

life.quote: Perhaps it's good for one to suffer. Can an artist do anything if he's happy? Would he ever want to do anything? What is art, after all, but a protest against the horrible inclemency of life?
life.author: Aldous Huxley

life.quote: Good morning," said the little prince.Good morning," said the merchant.This was a merchant who sold pills that had been invented to quench thirst. You need only swallow one pill a week, and you would feel no need for anything to drink.Why are you selling those?" asked the little prince.Because they save a tremendous amount of time," said the merchant. "Computations have been made by experts. With these pills, you save fifty-three minutes in every week."And what do I do with those fifty-three minutes?"Anything you like..."As for me," said the little prince to himself, "if I had fifty-three minutes to spend as I liked, I should walk at my leisure toward a spring of fresh water.
life.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

life.quote: Because no one needs to live for ever. I think that sometimes you can outstay your welcome.
life.author: Gemma Malley

life.quote: It isn't good to hold on too hard to the past. You can't spend your whole life looking back. Not even when you can't see what lies ahead. All you can do is keep on keeping on, and try to believe that tomorrow will be what it should be—even if it isn't what you expected.
life.author: Jim Butcher

life.quote: What are you thinking?" he asks.I know Gage hates it when I cry - he is completely undone by the sight of tears - so I blink hard against the sting. "I'm thinking how thankful I am for everything," I say, "even the bad stuff. Every sleepless night, every second of being lonely, every time the car broke down, every wad of gum on my shoe, every late bill and losing lottery ticket and bruise and broken dish and piece of burnt toast."His voice is soft. "Why, darlin'?"Because it all led me here to you.
life.author: Lisa Kleypas

life.quote: Mom always liked to say that we hardly ever know the decisions we make that change our lives, mostly because they are little ones. You took this bus instead of that one and ended up meeting your soul mate, that kind of thing. But there was no doubt in my mind that this was one of those life-changing moments.
life.author: Rachel Hawkins

life.quote: Ah, Nothing is too late, till the tired heart shall cease to palpitate.
life.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

life.quote: Out, out brief candle, life is but a walking shadow...a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Wake up, Shake up, Make up and Break up; life is all about moving like ant in search of sugar not sand.
life.author: Santosh Kalwar

life.quote: my friends don't seem to be friends at all but people whose phone numbers I haven't lost.
life.author: Nick Hornby

life.quote: Because if you take a risk, you just might find what you're looking for.
life.author: Susane Colasanti

life.quote: There are two kinds of people,’ she’d said. ‘Those who coast through life like ducks in a row, following one after the other, and those who ride the waves.’" Tears spilled down my cheeks, and my voice cracked. "‘Ride the waves, baby, and live. Live.
life.author: Gena Showalter

life.quote: How unhappy does one have to be before living seems worse than dying?
life.author: Deborah Curtis

life.quote: Know that the same spark of life that is within you, is within all of our animal friends, the desire to live is the same within all of us...
life.author: Rai Aren

life.quote: When your sad--like really sad--you only want to be with other people who are sad.
life.author: Nick Hornby

life.quote: Life never gives us what we want at the moment that we consider appropriate. Adventures do occur, but not punctually.
life.author: E.M. Forster

life.quote: Some people think that a place can save them... Like if they could just be somewhere else, their lives would be totally different. They could finally be the people they always wanted to be. But to me, a place is just a place. If you really want things to change, you can make them change no matter where you are.
life.author: Hannah Harrington

life.quote: Whether it is good or evil, whether life in itself is pain or pleasure, whether it is uncertain-that it may perhaps be this is not important-but the unity of the world, the coherence of all events, the embracing of the big and the small from the same stream, from the same law of cause, of becoming and dying.
life.author: Hermann Hesse

life.quote: When we cannot bear to be alone, it means we do not properly value the only companion we will have from birth to death - ourselves.
life.author: Eda LeShan

life.quote: Love is not a relationship, love is a state of being; it has nothing to do with anybody else. One is not "in love", one is love. And of course when one is love, one is in love – but that is an outcome, a by-product, that is not the source. The source is that one is love.
life.author: Osho

life.quote: Thunderstorms are as much our friends as the sunshine.
life.author: Criss Jami

life.quote: If you have nothing in life but a good friend, you're rich.
life.author: Michelle Kwan

life.quote: The world needs poetry now more than ever. It's the only thing that can keep music from copying itself and sounding the same.
life.author: Lana Del Rey

life.quote: Embrace the void and have the courage to exist.
life.author: Dan Howell

life.quote: Even if it were possible to cast my horoscope in this one life, and to make an accurate prediction about my future, it would not be possible to 'show' it to me because as soon as I saw it my future would change by definition. This is why Werner Heisenberg's adaptation of the Hays Office—the so-called principle of uncertainty whereby the act of measuring something has the effect of altering the measurement—is of such importance. In my case the difference is often made by publicity. For example, and to boast of one of my few virtues, I used to derive pleasure from giving my time to bright young people who showed promise as writers and who asked for my help. Then some profile of me quoted someone who disclosed that I liked to do this. Then it became something widely said of me, whereupon it became almost impossible for me to go on doing it, because I started to receive far more requests than I could respond to, let alone satisfy. Perception modifies reality: when I abandoned the smoking habit of more than three decades I was given a supposedly helpful pill called Wellbutrin. But as soon as I discovered that this was the brand name for an antidepressant, I tossed the bottle away. There may be successful methods for overcoming the blues but for me they cannot include a capsule that says: 'Fool yourself into happiness, while pretending not to do so.' I should actually want my mind to be strong enough to circumvent such a trick.
life.author: Christopher Hitchens

life.quote: Sometimes problems don’t require a solution to solve them; instead they require maturity to outgrow them.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: I know my life's meaningful because" - and here he stopped, and looked shy, and was silent for a moment before he continued - " because I'm a good friend. I love my friends, and I care about them, and I think I make them happy.
life.author: Hanya Yanagihara

life.quote: Some people's lives seem to flow in a narrative; mine had many stops and starts. That's what trauma does. It interrupts the plot. You can't process it because it doesn't fit with what came before or what comes afterward. A friend of mine, a soldier, put it this way. In most of our lives, most of the time, you have a sense of what is to come. There is a steady narrative, a feeling of "lights, camera, action" when big events are imminent. But trauma isn't like that. It just happens, and then life goes on. No one prepares you for it.
life.author: Jessica Stern

life.quote: I cannot tell if what the world considers ‘happiness’ is happiness or not. All I know is that when I consider the way they go about attaining it, I see them carried away headlong, grim and obsessed, in the general onrush of the human herd, unable to stop themselves or to change their direction. All the while they claim to be just on the point of attaining happiness.
life.author: Chuang-Tzu

life.quote: Those were strange days, now that I look back at them. In the midst of life, everything revolved around death.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: Sometimes the course of our lives depends on what we do or don't do in a few seconds, a heartbeat, when we either seize the opportunity, or just miss it. Miss the moment and you never get a chance again.
life.author: Aidan Chambers

life.quote: If life was a dream, then dying must be the moment when you woke up. It was so simple it must be true. You died, the dream was over, you woke up. That's what people meant when they talked about going to heaven. It was like waking up.
life.author: Ian McEwan

life.quote: Circe, he says, it will be all right.It is not the saying of an oracle or a prophet. ... He does not mean that it does not hurt. He does not mean that we are not frightened. Only that: we are here. This is what it means to swim in the tide, to walk the earth and feel it touch your feet. This is what is means to be alive.
life.author: Madeline Miller

life.quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems; it's the ability to deal with them.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: Stop trying to be less of who you are. Let this time in your life cut you open and drain all of the things that are holding you back.
life.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

life.quote: Accept yourself, your strengths, your weaknesses, your truths, and know what tools you have to fulfill your purpose.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: I don’t see myself being special; I just see myself having more responsibilities than the next man. People look to me to do things for them, to have answers.
life.author: Tupac Shakur

life.quote: The scientist does not study nature because it is useful to do so. He studies it because he takes pleasure in it, and he takes pleasure in it because it is beautiful. If nature were not beautiful it would not be worth knowing, and life would not be worth living. I am not speaking, of course, of the beauty which strikes the senses, of the beauty of qualities and appearances. I am far from despising this, but it has nothing to do with science. What I mean is that more intimate beauty which comes from the harmonious order of its parts, and which a pure intelligence can grasp.
life.author: Henri Poincaré

life.quote: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
life.author: Bob Dylan

life.quote: All I know is I make sense to me- it's other people who seem complicated.
life.author: Tara Kelly

life.quote: True life lies in laughter, love and work.
life.author: Elbert Hubbard

life.quote: I've come to know that what we want in life is the greatest indication of who we really are.
life.author: Richard Paul Evans

life.quote: I am not my body. My body is nothing without me.
life.author: Tom Stoppard

life.quote: Life is a train of moods like a string of beads; and as we pass through them they prove to be many colored lenses, which paint the world their own hue, and each shows us only what lies in its own focus.
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: At least one thing was consistent about her life: It just kept on getting more complicated.
life.author: Scott Westerfeld

life.quote: The way you give your name to others is a measure of how much you like and respect yourself.
life.author: Brian Tracy

life.quote: You are the grim, goal-oriented ones who will not believe that the joy is in the journey rather than the destination no matter how many times it has been proven to you.
life.author: Stephen King

life.quote: I felt the taste of mortality in my mouth, and at that moment I understood that I was not going to live forever. It takes a long time to learn that, but when you finally do, everything changes inside you, you can never be the same again. I was seventeen years old, and all of a sudden, without the slightest flicker of a doubt, I understood that my life was my own, that it belonged to me and no one else.I’m talking about freedom, Fogg. A sense of despair that becomes so great, so crushing, so catastrophic, that you have no choice but to be liberated by it. That’s the only choice, or else you crawl into a corner and die.
life.author: Paul Auster

life.quote: ...people with nothing to declare carry the most.
life.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

life.quote: Never judge someone's character based on the words of another. Instead, study the motives behind the words of the person casting the bad judgment.
life.author: Suzy Kassem

life.quote: Life is painful and disappointing. It is useless, therefore, to write new realistic novels. We generally know where we stand in relation to reality and don’t care to know any more.
life.author: Michel Houellebecq

life.quote: Have you ever noticed how as an adult, all the bright colors go out of your life? Now that I’m not a kid anymore, things always look gray, like a clothesline draped with laundry that’s been washed too many times and left to stand in the wind. I guess that’s what growing up is… it’s a fading photograph.
life.author: Rebecca McNutt

life.quote: He knew sometimes some fear can be good. When you are afraid things are going to get worse if you don't do something, it can prompt you into action. But it is not good when you are afraid that it keeps you from doing anything.
life.author: Spencer Johnson

life.quote: Fantasy is silver and scarlet, indigo and azure, obsidian veined with gold and lapis lazuli. Reality is plywood and plastic, done up in mud brown and olive drab. Fantasy tastes of habaneros and honey, cinnamon and cloves, rare red meat and wines as sweet as summer. Reality is beans and tofu, and ashes at the end.
life.author: George R.R. Martin

life.quote: Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do" list of tomorrow! It’s inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: I’ve never once thought about how I was going to die," she said. "I can’t think about it. I don’t even know how I’m going to live.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: I don’t know what it means to live.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: There is no loss, if you cannot remember what you have lost.
life.author: Claire North

life.quote: If we stay where we are, where we're stuck, where we're comfortable and safe, we die there. We become like mushrooms, living in the dark, with poop up to our chins. If you want to know only what you already know, you're dying. You're saying: Leave me alone; I don't mind this little rathole. It's warm and dry. Really, it's fine.When nothing new can get in, that's death. When oxygen can't find a way in, you die. But new is scary, and new can be disappointing, and confusing - we had this all figured out, and now we don't.New is life.
life.author: Anne Lamott

life.quote: I believe that half the trouble in the world comes from people asking 'What have I achieved?' rather than 'What have I enjoyed?' I've been writing about a subject I love as long as I can remember--horses and the people associated with them, anyplace, anywhere, anytime. I couldn't be happier knowing that young people are reading my books. But even more important to me is that I've enjoyed so much the writing of them.
life.author: Walter Farley

life.quote: In this lifetime you're nothing more than you appear to be: a stupid, selfish, ignorant, spoiled little girl who thinks the world lives or dies on whether she gets to go out with some good-looking boy at school...I'd still relish this moment...killing you.
life.author: lauren kate

life.quote: We each owe a death, there are no exceptions, I know that, but sometimes, oh God, the Green Mile is so long
life.author: Stephen King

life.quote: Our country is the best country in the world. We are swimming in prosperity and our President is the best president in the world. We have larger apples and better cotton and faster and more beautiful machines. This makes us the greatest country in the world. Unemployment is a myth. Dissatisfaction is a fable. In preparatory school America is beautiful. It is the gem of the ocean and it is too bad. It is bad because people believe it all. Because they become indifferent. Because they marry and reproduce and vote and they know nothing.
life.author: John Cheever

life.quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.
life.author: Santosh Kalwar

life.quote: There is something incredibly nostalgic and significant about the annual cascade of autumn leaves.
life.author: Joe L. Wheeler

life.quote: So I would choose to be with you,That's if the choice were mine to make,But you can make decisions too,And you can have this heart to break
life.author: Billy Joel

life.quote: Life is doubt,And faith without doubt is nothing but death.
life.author: Miguel de Unamuno

life.quote: Sometimes we love with nothing more than hope. Sometimes we cry with everything except tears. In the end that’s all there is: love and its duty, sorrow and its truth. In the end that’s all we have - to hold on tight until the dawn
life.author: Gregory David Roberts

life.quote: We are star stuff harvesting sunlight.
life.author: Carl Sagan

life.quote: Do not forget that the value and interest of life is not so much to do conspicuous things...as to do ordinary things with the perception of their enormous value.
life.author: Pierre Teilhard De Chardin

life.quote: Life lived in the absence of the psychedelic experience that primordial shamanism is based on is life trivialized, life denied, life enslaved to the ego.
life.author: Terence McKenna

life.quote: I heard an airplane passing overhead. I wished I was on it.
life.author: Charles Bukowski

life.quote: Life, if you keep chasing it so hard, will drive you to death. Time - when pursued like a bandit - will behave like one, always remaining one county or one room ahead of you, changing its name and hair color to elude you, slipping out the back door of the motel just as you're banging through the lobby with your newest search warrant, leaving only a burning cigarette in the ashtray to taunt you. At some point you have to stop because it won't. You have to admit that you can't catch it. That you're not supposed to catch it. At some point, you gotta let go and sit still and allow contentment to come to you.
life.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

life.quote: But life isn't something that should be edited. Life shouldn't be cut. The only way you'll ever discover what it truly means to be alive and human is by sharing the full experience of what it means to be human and each blemish and freckle that comes with it.
life.author: Iain Thomas

life.quote: When mice run, cats give chase.
life.author: Rachel Vincent

life.quote: I am of certain convinced that the greatest heroes are those who do their duty in the daily grind of domestic affairs whilst the world whirls as a maddening dreidel.
life.author: Florence Nightingale

life.quote: Most people gaze neither into the past nor the future; they explore neither truth nor lies. They gaze at the television.
life.author: Radiohead

life.quote: Life is neither static nor unchanging. With no individuality, there can be no change, no adaptation and, in an inherently changing world, any species unable to adapt is also doomed.
life.author: Jean M. Auel

life.quote: Reshaping life! People who can say that have never understood a thing about life—they have never felt its breath, its heartbeat—however much they have seen or done. They look on it as a lump of raw material that needs to be processed by them, to be ennobled by their touch. But life is never a material, a substance to be molded. If you want to know, life is the principle of self-renewal, it is constantly renewing and remaking and changing and transfiguring itself, it is infinitely beyond your or my obtuse theories about it.
life.author: Boris Pasternak

life.quote: There is nothing more mysterious than a TV set left on in an empty room. It is even stranger than a man talking to himself or a woman standing dreaming at her stove. It is as if another planet is communicating with you.
life.author: Jean Baudrillard

life.quote: If we were to one day encounter a form of life more powerful and intelligent than our own, and it regarded us as we regard fish, what would be our argument against being eaten?
life.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

life.quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.
life.author: Vernon Howard

life.quote: It was a melancholy secret that reality can arouse desires but never satisfy them.
life.author: Erich Maria Remarque

life.quote: You know how the tightrope guy at the circus wants everyone to believe his act is an art, but deep down you can see that he's really just hoping he makes it all the way across?
life.author: Jodi Picoult

life.quote: Memory is like patches of sunlight in an overcast valley, shifting with the movement of the clouds. Now and then the light will fall on a particular point in time, illuminating it for a moment before the wind seals up the gap, and the world is in shadows again.
life.author: Tan Twan Eng

life.quote: Simplify, simplify.
life.author: Henry David Thoreau

life.quote: Don't dwell on things. Don't stay in one place too long. It was the only way to stay ahead of sadness.
life.author: Rick Riordan

life.quote: Sacrfice," the captain said. "You made one. I made one. We all made them. But you were angry over yours. You kept thinking about what you lost. You didn't get it. Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to.
life.author: Mitch Albom

life.quote: The difference between me and other people is that they all walk around with onion skins wrapped around them. Pre-meditations, pretentions, the faces that they present to the world, the faces that they present to themselves.. onion skins that come in layer after layer. They're on the inside of all that. And I... I am the inside of the onion skin walking around. I am only me.
life.author: C. JoyBell C.

life.quote: I must die. Must I then die lamenting? I must be put in chains. Must I then also lament? I must go into exile. Does any man then hinder me from going with smiles and cheerfulness and contentment?
life.author: Epictetus

life.quote: Maybe getting around in life was nothing but map-reading. A skill that required practice. A key to unlock where you wanted to go. A legend to show where you were.
life.author: Justina Chen Headley

life.quote: Cheat your landlord if you can -- and must -- but do not try to shortchange the Muse.
life.author: William S. Burroughs

life.quote: Knowing death is nearby gives you a chance to live...deliberately." -Tristan
life.author: Chelsea Fine

life.quote: Silence is argument carried out by other means.
life.author: Ernesto "Che" Guevara

life.quote: We remember the past, live in the present, and write the future.
life.author: Shaun David Hutchinson

life.quote: I finally figured out that not every crisis can be managed. As much as we want to keep ourselves safe, we can't protect ourselves from everything. If we want to embrace life, we also have to embrace chaos.
life.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

life.quote: Be the kind of person who dares to face life's challenges and overcome them rather than dodging them.
life.author: Roy T. Bennett

life.quote: Sometimes it's the same moments that take your breath away that breathe purpose and love back into your life.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: I saw the years of my life spaced along a road in the form of telephone poles threaded together by wires. I counted one, two, three... nineteen telephone poles, and then the wires dangled into space, and try as I would, I couldn't see a single pole beyond the nineteenth.
life.author: Sylvia Plath

life.quote: People will kill you. Over time. They will shave out every last morsel of fun in you with little, harmless sounding phrases that people uses every day, like: 'Be realistic!'"[What It Is (2009)]
life.author: Dylan Moran

life.quote: Now I've gone for too longLiving like I'm not aliveSo I'm going to start over tonightBeginning with you and I
life.author: Hayley Williams

life.quote: The only thing you have to do in this life is die," said Mrs. Pinsky..."everything else is a choice.
life.author: Karen Thompson Walker

life.quote: This is love, I think. A place where people who have been alone may lock together like hawks and spin in the air, dizzy with surprise at the connection. A place you go willingly, and with wonder
life.author: Jodi Picoult

life.quote: Skinny guys fight till they're burger.
life.author: Chuck Palahniuk

life.quote: Kalau ada kupu-kupu yang terperangkap di sarang laba-laba, orang cenderung akan menolong kupu-kupu itu walaupun mungkin si laba-laba belum makan selama berhari-hari..Tapi gimana kalau yang terperangkap adalah ulat yang belum jadi kupu-kupu? Orang tetap nolong nggak? Padahal, keduanya sama. Di dunia ini, memang harus cantik supaya ditolong.
life.author: Windhy Puspitadewi

life.quote: Because, sometimes, things happen to people and they're not equipped to deal with them.
life.author: Suzanne Collins

life.quote: Remember that things are not always as they appear to be… Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.
life.author: Roy T. Bennett

life.quote: What looks like garbage from one angle might be art from another. Maybe it did take a crisis to get to know yourself; maybe you needed to get whacked hard by life before you understood what you wanted out of it.
life.author: Jodi Picoult

life.quote: His words are like the sound of a needle dragging across a record. A sinking, sickening feeling washes over me. This is why you should never, ever get your hopes up. This is why you should see the glass as half empty. So, when the whole things spills, you aren't as devastated.
life.author: Emily Giffin

life.quote: If my answers frighten you then you should cease asking scary questions.
life.author: Quentin Tarantino

life.quote: You know why love stories have happy endings?" I shake my head."Because they end too early," she continues. "They always end right at the kiss. You never have to see all the bullshit that comes later. You know, Life.
life.author: Hank Moody

life.quote: Sometimes I feel that life has passed me by... Do you ever feel that way, Charlie Brown?"I feel that it has knocked me down and walked all over me!
life.author: Charles M. Schulz

life.quote: It is the beginning of wisdom when you recognize that the best you can do is choose which rules you want to live by, and it's persistent and aggravated imbecility to pretend you can live without any.
life.author: Wallace Stegner

life.quote: Toby Zeigler: There's literally no one in the world I don't hate right now.
life.author: Aaron Sorkin

life.quote: I have a theory about marriage, Monsieur Boustouler. And it's that nearly always you will know within two weeks if it's going to work. It's astonishing how many people remain shackled for years, decades even, in a protracted and mutual state of self-delusion and false hope when in fact they had their answer in those first two weeks.
life.author: Khaled Hosseini

life.quote: The seeker embarks on a journey to find what he wants and discovers, along the way, what he needs.
life.author: Wally Lamb

life.quote: Cancel my subscription to the resurrection.
life.author: Jim Morrison

life.quote: The clear awareness of having been born into a losing struggle need not lead one into despair. I do not especially like the idea that one day I shall be tapped on the shoulder and informed, not that the party is over but that it is most assuredly going on—only henceforth in my absence. (It's the second of those thoughts: the edition of the newspaper that will come out on the day after I have gone, that is the more distressing.) Much more horrible, though, would be the announcement that the party was continuing forever, and that I was forbidden to leave. Whether it was a hellishly bad party or a party that was perfectly heavenly in every respect, the moment that it became eternal and compulsory would be the precise moment that it began to pall.
life.author: Christopher Hitchens

life.quote: There are some choices you can only make once. You can't go back to where you made a choice and then take the other one.
life.author: Mary Hoffman

life.quote: Men acquire a particular quality by constantly acting a particular way... you become just by performing just actions, temperate by performing temperate actions, brave by performing brave actions.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: I had a dream about you last night... you were a giant slinky and I watched you fall down the stairs.
life.author: Amy Summers

life.quote: Single is not a status, it is a word that describes a person who is strong enough to live and enjoy life without depending on others.
life.author: prixie

life.quote: And there are really never endings, happy or otherwise.
life.author: Erin Morgenstern

life.quote: Expect nothing. Live frugallyOn surprise.become a strangerTo need of pityOr, if compassion be freelyGiven outTake only enoughStop short of urge to pleadThen purge away the need.Wish for nothing largerThan your own small heartOr greater than a star;Tame wild disappointmentWith caress unmoved and coldMake of it a parkaFor your soul.Discover the reason whySo tiny human midgetExists at allSo scared unwiseBut expect nothing. Live frugallyOn surprise.
life.author: alice walker

life.quote: Things don't always work out the way we hope. You just have to pick yourself up and find a new direction to go in.
life.author: Joelle Charbonneau

life.quote: The great Sufi poet and philosopher Rumi once advised his students to write down the three things they most wanted in life. If any item on the list clashes with any other item, Rumi warned, you are destined for unhappiness. Better to live a life of single-pointed focus, he taught. But what about the benefits of living harmoniously among extremes? What if you could somehow create an expansive enough life that you could synchronize seemingly incongruous opposites into a worldview that excludes nothing?
life.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

life.quote: It’s a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: People who fit don’t seek. The seekers are those that don’t fit.
life.author: Shannon L. Alder

life.quote: I do not cling to life sufficiently to fear death.
life.author: Alexandre Dumas

life.quote: Some of the most beautiful things we have in life comes from our mistakes.
life.author: Surgeo Bell

life.quote: Work harder on yourself than you do on your job.
life.author: Jim Rohn

life.quote: Some days you must learn a great deal. But you should also have days when you allow what is already in you to swell up and touch everything. If you never let that happen, then you just accumulate facts, and they begin to rattle around inside of you.
life.author: E. L. Konigsburg

life.quote: Life is long, and sometimes cruel. Sometimes victims are needed. Someone has to take on that role. And human bodies are fragile, easily damaged. Cut them, and they bleed.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: Can't you ever be serious?' I said, mortified.'It's difficult,' he said. 'There's so little in life that's worth it.
life.author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

life.quote: The secret of the mountain is that the mountains simply exist, as I do myself: the mountains exist simply, which I do not. The mountains have no "meaning," they are meaning; the mountains are. The sun is round. I ring with life, and the mountains ring, and when I can hear it, there is a ringing that we share. I understand all this, not in my mind but in my heart, knowing how meaningless it is to try to capture what cannot be expressed, knowing that mere words will remain when I read it all again, another day.
life.author: Peter Matthiessen

life.quote: Middle age has been defined as what happens when a person's broad mind and narrow waist change places.
life.author: A.C. Grayling

life.quote: Do you understand what I'm saying?"shouted Moist. "You can't just go around killing people!"Why Not? You Do." The golem lowered his arm."What?" snapped Moist. "I do not! Who told you that?"I Worked It Out. You Have Killed Two Point Three Three Eight People," said the golem calmly."I have never laid a finger on anyone in my life, Mr Pump. I may be–– all the things you know I am, but I am not a killer! I have never so much as drawn a sword!"No, You Have Not. But You Have Stolen, Embezzled, Defrauded And Swindled Without Discrimination, Mr Lipvig. You Have Ruined Businesses And Destroyed Jobs. When Banks Fail, It Is Seldom Bankers Who Starve. Your Actions Have Taken Money From Those Who Had Little Enough To Begin With. In A Myriad Small Ways You Have Hastened The Deaths Of Many. You Do Not Know Them. You Did Not See Them Bleed. But You Snatched Bread From Their Mouths And Tore Clothes From Their Backs. For Sport, Mr Lipvig. For Sport. For The Joy Of The Game.
life.author: Terry Pratchett

life.quote: Find a voice in a whisper.
life.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

life.quote: Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: Even without wars, life is dangerous.
life.author: Anne Sexton

life.quote: Life is just too much for me. I've been confused right from the day I was born... I think the whole trouble is that we're thrown into life too fast... We're not really prepared..."What did you want... A chance to warm up first?
life.author: Charles M. Schulz

life.quote: [O]ur honeymoon will shine our life long: its beams will only fade over your grave or mine.
life.author: Charlotte Brontë

life.quote: The truth was, history repeated itself on a daily basis; mistakes were made over and over. People were haunted by what they had done, and by what they hadn't had time to do.
life.author: Jodi Picoult

life.quote: I get it now; I didn't get it then. That life is about losing and about doing it as gracefully as possible...and enjoying everything in between.
life.author: Mia Farrow

life.quote: Later on in life, you expect a bit of rest, don't you? You think you deserve it. I did, anyway. But then you begin to understand that the reward of merit is not life's business.
life.author: Julian Barnes

life.quote: If you want something, you don't wait for the world to deal it out for you. You take it.
life.author: Poppy Z. Brite

life.quote: But a kingdom that has once been destroyed can never come again into being; nor can the dead ever be brought back to life.
life.author: Sun Tzu

life.quote: Your life is not your own. Keep your hands off it.
life.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

life.quote: ...It’s hard to watchthe game we make of love,like everyone’s playing checkerswith their scars,saying checkmatewhenever they get outwithout a broken heart.Just to be clearI don’t want to get outwithout a broken heart.I intend to leave this lifeso shatteredthere’s gonna have to bea thousand separate heavensfor all of my flying parts.
life.author: Andrea Gibson

life.quote: المجتمع الذي يتنافس أفراده على شراء الكتب لابد أن يتفوّق على المجتمع الذي يتنافس أفراده على شراء الهواتف النقالة
life.author: ياسر حارب

life.quote: Endless moons, an opaque universe, thunder, tornadoes, the quaking earth. Rare moments of peace; forehead up against my knees, arms around my head, I thought, I listened, I longed not to exist. But life was there, a transparent pearl, a star revolving slowly on its own axis.
life.author: Shan Sa

life.quote: If you are waiting for anything in order to live and love without holding back, then you suffer.
life.author: David Deida

life.quote: But certainly, for us who understand life, figures are a matter of indifference.
life.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

life.quote: We are all dying, every moment that passes of every day. That is the inescapable truth of this existence. It is a truth that can paralyze us with fear, or one that can energize us with impatience, with the desire to explore and experience, with the hope- nay, the iron-will!- to find a memory in every action. To be alive, under sunshine, or starlight, in weather fair or stormy. To dance with every step, be they through gardens of flowers or through deep snows.
life.author: R.A. Salvatore

life.quote: Life' wrote a friend of mine, 'is a public performance on the violin, in which you must learn the instrument as you go along.
life.author: E.M. Forster

life.quote: Letting him goThere is a particular kind of suffering to be experienced when you love something greater than yourself. A tender sacrifice. Like the pained silence felt in the lost song of a mermaid; or the bent and broken feet of a dancing ballerina. It is in every considered step I am taking in the opposite direction of you.
life.author: Lang Leav

life.quote: Dying was nothing and he had no picture of it nor fear of it in his mind. But living was a field of grain blowing in the wind on the side of a hill. Living was a hawk in the sky. Living was an earthen jar of water in the dust of the threshing with the grain flailed out and the chaff blowing. Living was a horse between your legs and a carbine under one leg and a hill and a valley and a stream with trees along it and the far side of the valley and the hills beyond.
life.author: Ernest Hemingway

life.quote: For a word to be spoken, there must be silence. Before, and after.
life.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

life.quote: The power of God is with you at all times; through the activities of mind, senses, breathing, and emotions; and is constantly doing all the work using you as a mere instrument.
life.author: Anonymous

life.quote: We are always falling in love or quarreling, looking for jobs or fearing to lose them, getting ill and recovering, following public affairs. If we let ourselves, we shall always be waiting for some distraction or other to end before we can really get down to our work. The only people who achieve much are those who want knowledge so badly that they seek it while the conditions are still unfavorable. Favorable conditions never come.
life.author: C.S. Lewis

life.quote: That’s the duty of the old, to be anxious on behalf of the young. And the duty of the young is to scorn the anxiety of the old.
life.author: Philip Pullman

life.quote: How does fear become so powerful? We can’t see it. We can’t touch it, yet it gets its claws in us and begins to control us. Sigh. I hate feeling afraid, and I hate, hate, HATE feeling out of control.
life.author: Gena Showalter

life.quote: Opinions are the cheapest commodities on earth. Everyone has a flock of opinions ready to be wished upon anyone who will accept them. If you are influenced by "opinions" when you reach DECISIONS, you will not succeed in any undertaking.
life.author: Napoleon Hill

life.quote: The rain fluctuates between drizzle and torrential. It messes with your mind. It makes you think things will always be like this, never getting better, always letting you down right when you though the worst was over.
life.author: Susane Colasanti

life.quote: Life should be a risk. It's more than a straight line that you can see clearly from one point to the other. It dips and curves and you never know what's around the bend sometimes until you get there. That scares a lot of people. But that's the beauty of it.
life.author: Katie Kacvinsky

life.quote: There's difference between being dead and dying. We're all dying. Some of us die for ninety years, and some of us die for nineteen. But each morning everyone on this planet wakes up one day closer to their death. Everyone. So living and dying are actually different words for the same thing, if you think about it.
life.author: Robyn Schneider

life.quote: The word ‘sin’ is derived from the Indo-European root ‘es-,’ meaning ‘to be.’ When I discovered this etymology, I intuitively understood that for a [person] trapped in patriarchy, which is the religion of the entire planet, ‘to be’ in the fullest sense is ‘to sin'.
life.author: Mary Daly

life.quote: Guilt results from unused life, from the unlived in us.
life.author: Ernest Becker

life.quote: Living might mean taking chances, but they're worth taking. Loving might be a mistake. but its worth making
life.author: Reba McEntire

life.quote: The problem with the designated driver program, it's not a desirable job, but if you ever get sucked into doing it, have fun with it. At the end of the night, drop them off at the wrong house.
life.author: Jeff Foxworthy

life.quote: Temptation is the feeling we get when encountered by an opportunity to do what we innately know we shouldn't.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: For truth is always strange; stranger than fiction.
life.author: George Gordon Byron

life.quote: I'm hungry for a juicy life. I lean out my window at night and I can taste it out there, just waiting for me.
life.author: Brigid Lowry

life.quote: Each book is a mind alive, a life revealed, a world awaiting exploration, but living people are all those things, as well—and more, because their stories haven’t yet been completely told.
life.author: Dean Koontz

life.quote: They had, finally, the only thing anyone really wants in life: someone to hold your hand when you die.
life.author: Lorrie Moore

life.quote: We all like to think the world ends when we do. The truth is our acquaintances, our friends, and our loved ones all live on, and through them, so do we. It's not about what you had, but what you gave. It's not about how you looked, but how you lived. And it's not just about being remembered. It's about giving people a good reason to remember you.
life.author: Tonya Hurley

life.quote: It was the living who ignored the strange and wonderful, because life was too full of the boring and mundane.
life.author: Terry Pratchett

life.quote: She smiled. She knew she was dying. But it did not matter any longer. She had known something which no human words could ever tell and she knew it now. She had been awaiting it and she felt it, as if it had been, as if she had lived it. Life had been, if only because she had known it could be, and she felt it now as a hymn without sound, deep under the little whole that dripped red drops into the snow, deeper than that from which the red drops came. A moment or an eternity- did it matter? Life, undefeated, existed and could exist. She smiled, her last smile, to so much that had been possible.
life.author: Ayn Rand

life.quote: Even death, faced with the option of death or life, she would choose life.
life.author: José Saramago

life.quote: I had to philosophize. Otherwise, I could not live in this world.
life.author: Edmund Husserl

life.quote: Often it feels like I am breathing today only because a few years back I had no idea which nerve to cut...
life.author: Sanhita Baruah

life.quote: ...because love is continual interrogation. I don't know of a better definition of love.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Do not live in the shadow of the masters for ever. Learn to live in the light of your soul. Life deserves full expression.
life.author: Amit Ray

life.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
life.author: Beverly Sills

life.quote: Give me strength, not to be better than my enemies, but to defeat my greatest enemy, the doubts within myself. Give me strength for a straight back and clear eyes, so when life fades, as the setting sun, my spirit may come to you without shame.
life.author: P.C. Cast & Kristin Cast

life.quote: Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the choices you make and the actions you take today.
life.author: Roy T. Bennett

life.quote: Things will get easier, people's minds will change, and you should be alive to see it.
life.author: Ellen DeGeneres

life.quote: Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: Whether you like it or not, you are committed to the human endeavor. I cannot ally myself with such a purely negative goal as avoidance of suffering. Suffering is a chance you take by the fact of being alive.
life.author: William S. Burroughs

life.quote: As for me, I was just trying to get it right, whatever that means. But now I finally felt I was on my way. Everyone had a forever, but given a choice, this would be mine. The one that began in this moment, with Wes, in a kiss that took my breath away, then gave it back - leaving meastounded, amazed and most of all, alive.
life.author: Sarah Dessen

life.quote: The fact that a cloud from a minor volcanic eruption in Iceland—a small disturbance in the complex mechanism of life on the Earth—can bring to a standstill the aerial traffic over an entire continent is a reminder of how, with all its power to transform nature, humankind remains just another species on the planet Earth.
life.author: Slavoj Žižek

life.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
life.author: Aaron Lauritsen

life.quote: I wanted to cry because I needed you there with me so bad. I knew in that moment that I was in love with you. I was in love with the way you loved me. When you wrapped your arms around me and held me, I knew that no matter what happened with my life, you were my home. You stole the biggest piece of my heart that night.
life.author: Colleen Hoover

life.quote: You might never fail on the scale I did, but some failure in life is inevitable. It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default.
life.author: J.K. Rowling

life.quote: Pray for the dead and fight like hell for the living.
life.author: Mother Jones

life.quote: You are the only you ... You are the best you. You will always be the second best anyone else.
life.author: Leo Buscaglia

life.quote: I learned...that inspiration does not come like a bolt, nor is it kinetic, energetic striving, but it comes into us slowly and quietly and all the time, though we must regularly and every day give it a little chance to start flowing, prime it with a little solitude and idleness.
life.author: Brenda Ueland

life.quote: To live is to be haunted.
life.author: Philip K. Dick

life.quote: Unless you have great parents or some inspirational teacher from a movie that pushes you to follow your dreams, you can't expect a kid to be smart enough to realize they can do what they want with their life before they've been pushed through the school system into having an average life.
life.author: Dan Howell

life.quote: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.
life.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

life.quote: Clearly, America has no shortage of metaphorical opportunities for the poor.
life.author: Stephen Colbert

life.quote: Women only cut their hair in times of crisis... It's somethin' a woman always has the power to do, even when she loses control over everything else. Cuttin' hair is a cry for help.
life.author: Bella Pollen

life.quote: My point is, that if I'm honest, my life is all about me.
life.author: Chuck Palahniuk

life.quote: A new day: Be open enough to see opportunities. Be wise enough to be grateful. Be courageous enough to be happy.
life.author: Steve Maraboli

life.quote: At such times the universe gets a little closer to us. They are strange times, times of beginnings and endings. Dangerous and powerful. And we feel it even if we don't know what it is. These times are not necessarily good, and not necessarily bad. In fact, what they are depends on what *we* are.
life.author: Terry Pratchett

life.quote: Imagine being sentient but not alive. Seeing and even knowing, but not alive. Just looking out. Recognizing but not being alive. A person can die and still go on. Sometimes what looks out at you from a person's eyes maybe died back in childhood.
life.author: Philip K. Dick

life.quote: There are always loose ends in real life.
life.author: Robert Galbraith

life.quote: The bad news is, your choices and intentions, some people and places, those nights spent awake and all you've done, can lead you to the bottom of the pit. The good news is, this wouldn't be the first time someone's crawled, tooth and nail, out of hell.
life.author: pleasefindthis

life.quote: My life will be the best illustration of all my work.
life.author: Hans Christian Andersen

life.quote: Life on earth is a whole, yet it expresses itself in unique time-bound bodies, microscopic or visible, plant or animal, extinct or living. So there can be no one place to be. There can be no one way to be, no one way to practice, no one way to learn, no one way to love, no one way to grow or to heal, no one way to live, no one way to feel, no one thing to know or be known. The particulars count.
life.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

life.quote: الصداقة باختصار هي إحدى إنجازاتنا الشخصية في هذه الحياة ..
life.author: أروى خميّس

life.quote: BRODIE:Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned for SEGA.
life.author: Kevin Smith

life.quote: It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.
life.author: Roy T. Bennett

life.quote: Be as you wish to seem.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: Joy is the best makeup.
life.author: Anne Lamott

life.quote: The cautious seldom err.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Well begun is half done.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: You give before you get.
life.author: Napoleon Hill

life.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: What we think, we become.
life.author: Buddha

life.quote: A jug fills drop by drop.
life.author: Buddha

life.quote: Do more than dream: work.
life.author: William Arthur Ward

life.quote: Fortune favours the brave.
life.author: Virgil

life.quote: Light tomorrow with today!
life.author: Elizabeth Browning

life.quote: Take it easy, but take it.
life.author: Woody Guthrie

life.quote: Peace begins with a smile.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Everything in life is luck.
life.author: Donald Trump

life.quote: Skill to do comes of doing.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: Fortune befriends the bold.
life.author: John Dryden

life.quote: He who is contented is rich.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Our passion is our strength.
life.author: Billie Armstrong

life.quote: Never, never, never give up.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Imagination rules the world.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: A good rest is half the work.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Smile, breathe and go slowly.
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: Speak low, if you speak love.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: What worries you masters you.
life.author: Haddon Robinson

life.quote: The shortest answer is doing.
life.author: Lord Herbert

life.quote: Who sows virtue reaps honour.
life.author: Leonardo da Vinci

life.quote: The beginning is always today.
life.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

life.quote: Open minds lead to open doors.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: When in doubt, tell the truth.
life.author: Mark Twain

life.quote: Smile, breathe, and go slowly.
life.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

life.quote: Change in all things is sweet.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: What you give is what you get.
life.author: Byron Pulsifer

life.quote: He who angers you conquers you.
life.author: Elizabeth Kenny

life.quote: No garden is without its weeds.
life.author: Thomas Fuller

life.quote: Our distrust is very expensive.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: No man was ever wise by chance.
life.author: Seneca

life.quote: Do, or do not. There is no try.
life.author: Yoda

life.quote: A rolling stone gathers no moss.
life.author: Publilius Syrus

life.quote: Things do not change; we change.
life.author: Henry Thoreau

life.quote: You only lose what you cling to.
life.author: Buddha

life.quote: Never mistake motion for action.
life.author: Ernest Hemingway

life.quote: You have to believe in yourself.
life.author: Sun Tzu

life.quote: Kindness is the greatest wisdom.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: The world is always in movement.
life.author: V. Naipaul

life.quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: Things do not change, we change.
life.author: Henry Thoreau

life.quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: To lead people walk behind them.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Be the chief but never the lord.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
life.author: Benjamin Franklin

life.quote: All is flux; nothing stays still.
life.author: Heraclitus

life.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: One fails forward toward success.
life.author: Charles Kettering

life.quote: He is able who thinks he is able.
life.author: Buddha

life.quote: As you think, so shall you become.
life.author: Bruce Lee

life.quote: Ignorance never settle a question.
life.author: Benjamin Disraeli

life.quote: Our intention creates our reality.
life.author: Wayne Dyer

life.quote: I think and that is all that I am.
life.author: Wayne Dyer

life.quote: If you wish to be a writer, write.
life.author: Epictetus

life.quote: Truth is powerful and it prevails.
life.author: Sojourner Truth

life.quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
life.author: Princess Diana

life.quote: You'll see it when you believe it.
life.author: Wayne Dyer

life.quote: God always takes the simplest way.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
life.author: Napoleon Hill

life.quote: Being angry never solves anything.
life.author: Catherine Pulsifer

life.quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom.
life.author: Samuel Johnson

life.quote: Well done is better than well said.
life.author: Benjamin Franklin

life.quote: Be slow of tongue and quick of eye.
life.author: Cervantes

life.quote: To fly, we have to have resistance.
life.author: Maya Lin

life.quote: Rainbows apologize for angry skies.
life.author: Sylvia Voirol

life.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
life.author: Walt Disney

life.quote: A beautiful thing is never perfect.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: The best way out is always through.
life.author: Robert Frost

life.quote: To be great is to be misunderstood.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: Try and fail, but don't fail to try.
life.author: Stephen Kaggwa

life.quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
life.author: Iris Murdoch

life.quote: You won't skid if you stay in a rut.
life.author: Kin Hubbard

life.quote: He who knows himself is enlightened.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
life.author: Haynes Bayly

life.quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: We do what we do because we believe.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: All things change; nothing perishes.
life.author: Ovid

life.quote: All great achievements require time.
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: One faces the future with ones past.
life.author: Pearl Buck

life.quote: Having nothing, nothing can he lose.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Life is just a chance to grow a soul.
life.author: A. Powell Davies

life.quote: Everyone smiles in the same language.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: You cannot have what you do not want.
life.author: John Acosta

life.quote: Almost everything comes from nothing.
life.author: Henri Amiel

life.quote: Time is the wisest counsellor of all.
life.author: Pericles

life.quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
life.author: Larry Elder

life.quote: Keep true to the dreams of thy youth.
life.author: Friedrich von Schiller

life.quote: I allow my intuition to lead my path.
life.author: Manuel Puig

life.quote: You can do it if you believe you can!
life.author: Napoleon Hill

life.quote: Change your words. Change your world.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: When you lose, don't lose the lesson.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply!
life.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

life.quote: Whoso loves, believes the impossible.
life.author: Elizabeth Browning

life.quote: Whatever happens, take responsibility.
life.author: Tony Robbins

life.quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: He who talks more is sooner exhausted.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: Self-complacency is fatal to progress.
life.author: Margaret Sangster

life.quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
life.author: Carl Sandburg

life.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
life.author: Anne Frank

life.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: All serious daring starts from within.
life.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

life.quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
life.author: Virgil

life.quote: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
life.author: Byron Pulsifer

life.quote: Life is a progress, and not a station.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: A man is great by deeds, not by birth.
life.author: Chanakya

life.quote: You can observe a lot just by watching.
life.author: Yogi Berra

life.quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
life.author: Seneca

life.quote: My reputation grows with every failure.
life.author: George Shaw

life.quote: Change your thoughts, change your life!
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: All know the way; few actually walk it.
life.author: Bodhidharma

life.quote: Never mistake activity for achievement.
life.author: John Wooden

life.quote: What we see is mainly what we look for.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Example has more followers than reason.
life.author: Christian Bovee

life.quote: Worry gives a small thing a big shadow.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
life.author: Horace

life.quote: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
life.author: Baltasar Gracian

life.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

life.quote: Time you enjoyed wasting was not wasted.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: A short saying oft contains much wisdom.
life.author: Sophocles

life.quote: From small beginnings come great things.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Never promise more than you can perform.
life.author: Publilius Syrus

life.quote: Freedom is the right to live as we wish.
life.author: Epictetus

life.quote: In order to win, you must expect to win.
life.author: Richard Bach

life.quote: The pain passes, but the beauty remains.
life.author: Pierre Auguste Renoir

life.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: From wonder into wonder existence opens.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
life.author: Sophocles

life.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
life.author: Jean de la Fontaine

life.quote: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Put your future in good hands, your own.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Some pursue happiness, others create it.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Much wisdom often goes with fewer words.
life.author: Sophocles

life.quote: The price of greatness is responsibility.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: You always succeed in producing a result.
life.author: Tony Robbins

life.quote: Most smiles are started by another smile.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: No is easier to do. Yes is easier to say.
life.author: Jason Fried

life.quote: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
life.author: Abraham Lincoln

life.quote: We must become the change we want to see.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: A prudent question is one half of wisdom.
life.author: Francis Bacon

life.quote: Once you choose hope, anythings possible.
life.author: Christopher Reeve

life.quote: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses.
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: Someone is special only if you tell them.
life.author: Byron Pulsifer

life.quote: The simplest things are often the truest.
life.author: Richard Bach

life.quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: To see things in the seed, that is genius.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Great talent finds happiness in execution.
life.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

life.quote: The only real valuable thing is intuition.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
life.author: Doris Day

life.quote: We lost because we told ourselves we lost.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: The wisest men follow their own direction.
life.author: Euripides

life.quote: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
life.author: Sophocles

life.quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
life.author: Richard Bach

life.quote: The harder you fall, the higher you bounce.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: Fear is a darkroom where negatives develop.
life.author: Usman Asif

life.quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?
life.author: George Patton

life.quote: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
life.author: Jim Rohn

life.quote: You can't choose up sides on a round world.
life.author: Wayne Dyer

life.quote: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
life.author: Ralph Emerson

life.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
life.author: Mike Ditka

life.quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
life.author: Buddha

life.quote: If you come to a fork in the road, take it.

life.quote: You can't shake hands with a clenched fist.

life.quote: The universe is made of stories, not atoms.
life.author: Muriel Rukeyser

life.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

life.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: If you have no respect for your own values how can you be worthy of respect from others.

life.quote: A failure is a man who has blundered but is not capable of cashing in on the experience.

life.quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.

life.quote: More often than not, anger is actually an indication of weakness rather than of strength.

life.quote: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.

life.quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

life.quote: To be what we are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life.

life.quote: Let your hook always be cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.

life.quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.

life.quote: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.

life.quote: Never be afraid to try, remember... Amateurs built the ark, Professionals built the Titanic.

life.quote: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.

life.quote: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.

life.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to a better understanding of ourselves.

life.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.

life.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.

life.quote: Don't leave a stone unturned. It's always something, to know you have done the most you could.

life.quote: With every experience, you alone are painting your own canvas, thought by thought, choice by choice.

life.quote: He can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law.

life.quote: Giving up doesn't always mean you are weak. Sometimes it means that you are strong enough to let go.

life.quote: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher.

life.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
